These_DT securities_NNS are_VBP attractive_JJ to_TO Japanese_JJ investors_NNS for_IN three_CD reasons_NNS ._.
First_LS ,_, they_PRP are_VBP safe_JJ ._.
While_IN they_PRP are_VBP n't_RB backed_VBN by_IN the_DT full_JJ faith_NN and_CC credit_NN of_IN the_DT U.S._NNP government_NN ,_, as_IN Treasury_NNP bonds_NNS are_VBP ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ widely_RB assumed_VBN that_IN the_DT government_NN would_MD support_VB them_PRP if_IN necessary_JJ ._.

But_CC there_EX is_VBZ a_DT risk_NN ,_, which_WDT the_DT Japanese_NNPS discovered_VBD when_WRB they_PRP first_RB dipped_VBD their_PRP$ toes_NNS into_IN the_DT market_NN nearly_RB five_CD years_NNS ago_RB ._.
Since_IN most_JJS mortgages_NNS can_MD be_VB prepaid_VBN or_CC refinanced_VBN at_IN any_DT time_NN ,_, issuers_NNS of_IN mortgage_NN securities_NNS retain_VBP the_DT right_NN to_TO buy_VB back_RB their_PRP$ bonds_NNS before_IN maturity_NN ._.
That_DT 's_VBZ a_DT headache_NN for_IN long-term_JJ investors_NNS ,_, since_IN it_PRP forces_VBZ them_PRP to_TO reinvest_VB their_PRP$ money_NN --_: usually_RB at_IN lower_JJR rates_NNS than_IN the_DT original_JJ mortgage_NN securities_NNS carried_VBD ._.
``_`` Two_CD or_CC three_CD years_NNS ago_RB ,_, the_DT problem_NN was_VBD that_IN people_NNS did_VBD n't_RB understand_VB the_DT prepayment_NN risk_NN ,_, ''_'' says_VBZ Nomura_NN 's_POS Mr._NNP Kato_NNP ._.
``_`` So_RB they_PRP were_VBD surprised_JJ and_CC very_RB disappointed_JJ by_IN prepayment_NN ._. ''_''
Compounding_VBG the_DT trouble_NN to_TO Japanese_JJ investors_NNS ,_, mortgage_NN securities_NNS pay_VBP interest_NN monthly_RB ,_, since_IN most_JJS mortgages_NNS require_VBP homeowners_NNS to_TO make_VB monthly_JJ payments_NNS ._.
But_CC Japanese_JJ institutional_JJ investors_NNS are_VBP used_VBN to_TO quarterly_JJ or_CC semiannual_JJ payments_NNS on_IN their_PRP$ investments_NNS ,_, so_IN the_DT monthly_JJ cash_NN flow_NN posed_VBD administrative_JJ problems_NNS ._.
As_IN a_DT result_NN ,_, Japanese_JJ investors_NNS steered_VBD clear_RB of_IN the_DT mortgage_NN securities_NNS ._.
But_CC they_PRP did_VBD n't_RB lose_VB touch_NN with_IN the_DT U.S._NNP issuers_NNS ._.

And_CC Japanese_JJ investors_NNS took_VBD up_RP nearly_RB all_DT of_IN two_CD $_$ 200_CD million_CD Real_JJ Estate_NNP Mortgage_NNP Investment_NNP Conduits_NNS ,_, a_DT kind_NN of_IN collateralized_JJ mortgage_NN obligation_NN ,_, that_WDT were_VBD offered_VBN to_TO foreigners_NNS this_DT year_NN ._.
In_IN addition_NN ,_, further_JJ packaging_NN of_IN mortgage-backed_JJ securities_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN Blackstone_VBP 's_POS fund_NN ,_, have_VB reduced_VBN the_DT effects_NNS of_IN prepayment_NN risk_NN and_CC automatically_RB reinvest_VB monthly_JJ payments_NNS so_IN institutions_NNS do_VBP n't_RB have_VB to_TO ._.
Freddie_NNP Mac_NNP for_IN years_NNS has_VBZ offered_VBN a_DT so-called_JJ participation_NN certificate_NN that_WDT guarantees_VBZ it_PRP wo_MD n't_RB be_VB prepaid_VBN for_IN a_DT set_NN number_NN of_IN years_NNS and_CC offers_VBZ semiannual_JJ payments_NNS ._.
As_IN Georgia-Pacific_NNP 's_POS bid_NN for_IN Great_NNP Northern_NNP Nekoosa_NNP has_VBZ shown_VBN ,_, uninvited_JJ takeovers_NNS are_VBP still_RB alive_JJ despite_IN premature_JJ reports_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ demise_NN ._.
Therefore_RB ,_, the_DT debate_NN about_IN poison_NN pills_NNS will_MD continue_VB to_TO rage_VB in_IN the_DT boardrooms_NNS of_IN corporations_NNS and_CC the_DT halls_NNS of_IN academia_NN ._.
Although_IN poison_NN pills_NNS come_VBP in_IN different_JJ colors_NNS and_CC shapes_NNS ,_, they_PRP usually_RB give_VBP current_JJ shareholders_NNS the_DT right_NN to_TO buy_VB more_JJR stock_NN of_IN their_PRP$ corporation_NN at_IN a_DT large_JJ discount_NN if_IN certain_JJ events_NNS occur_VBP --_: typically_RB ,_, if_IN a_DT hostile_JJ bidder_NN acquires_VBZ more_JJR than_IN a_DT specified_JJ percentage_NN of_IN the_DT corporation_NN 's_POS stock_NN ._.
However_RB ,_, these_DT discount_NN purchase_NN rights_NNS may_MD generally_RB be_VB redeemed_VBN at_IN a_DT nominal_JJ cost_NN by_IN the_DT corporation_NN 's_POS directors_NNS if_IN they_PRP approve_VBP of_IN a_DT bidder_NN ._.
Supporters_NNS of_IN poison_NN pills_NNS argue_VBP that_DT their_PRP$ adoption_NN forces_VBZ bidders_NNS to_TO negotiate_VB with_IN a_DT corporation_NN 's_POS directors_NNS ,_, who_WP are_VBP thereby_RB put_VBN in_IN a_DT better_JJR position_NN to_TO pursue_VB the_DT long-term_JJ interests_NNS of_IN the_DT corporation_NN ._.
Recent_JJ studies_NNS by_IN Georgeson_NNP &_CC Co._NNP conclude_VBP that_IN corporations_NNS with_IN poison_NN pills_NNS have_VBP experienced_VBN greater_JJR stock-price_JJ appreciation_NN than_IN corporations_NNS without_IN poison_NN pills_NNS during_IN the_DT past_JJ few_JJ years_NNS ._.
Critics_NNS of_IN poison_NN pills_NNS argue_VBP that_IN they_PRP harm_VBP shareholders_NNS by_IN letting_VBG corporate_JJ management_NN defeat_VB takeover_NN bids_NNS at_IN premium_JJ prices_NNS and_CC by_IN deterring_VBG premium_JJ bids_NNS from_IN ever_RB being_VBG made_VBN to_TO shareholders_NNS ._.

A_DT governing_VBG body_NN of_IN both_CC the_DT Financial_NNP Accounting_NNP Standards_NNP Board_NNP and_CC the_DT Governmental_NNP Accounting_NNP Standards_NNP Board_NNP voted_VBD to_TO give_VB the_DT FASB_NNP jurisdiction_NN over_IN accounting_NN standards_NNS for_IN certain_JJ government-owned_JJ entities_NNS ._.
The_DT Financial_NNP Accounting_NNP Foundation_NNP voted_VBD 12-2_RB that_DT FASB_NNP accounting_NN rules_NNS supercede_VBP GASB_NNP rules_NNS in_IN regard_NN to_TO utilities_NNS ,_, hospitals_NNS ,_, and_CC colleges_NNS and_CC universities_NNS owned_VBN by_IN the_DT government_NN ._.
GASB_NNP rules_NNS still_RB apply_VBP for_IN other_JJ government_NN units_NNS ._.
After_IN the_DT GASB_NNP was_VBD founded_VBN in_IN 1984_CD ,_, 11_CD years_NNS after_IN the_DT FASB_NNP ,_, the_DT government-owned_JJ entities_NNS were_VBD supposed_VBN to_TO follow_VB FASB_NNP rules_NNS unless_IN the_DT GASB_NNP superceded_VBD them_PRP ._.

The_DT foundation_NN vote_NN is_VBZ effective_JJ for_IN the_DT affected_JJ government_NN entities_NNS with_IN fiscal_JJ years_NNS that_WDT begin_VBP starting_VBG next_JJ Jan._NNP 1_CD and_CC makes_VBZ the_DT financial_JJ results_NNS of_IN the_DT hospitals_NNS ,_, colleges_NNS and_CC schools_NNS easier_JJR to_TO compare_VB with_IN for-profit_JJ businesses_NNS ._.

To_TO me_PRP ,_, this_DT calls_VBZ into_IN question_NN the_DT validity_NN of_IN the_DT Rowland-Molina_NNP theory_NN and_CC hence_RB the_DT whole_JJ chlorofluorocarbons_NNS replacement_NN effort_NN ._.

Due_JJ to_TO the_DT Treasury_NNP 's_POS need_NN to_TO raise_VB funds_NNS quickly_RB before_IN the_DT current_JJ authority_NN to_TO issue_VB debt_NN expires_VBZ at_IN midnight_NN tonight_NN ,_, yesterday_NN 's_POS auction_NN was_VBD structured_VBN differently_RB from_IN previous_JJ sales_NNS ._.

And_CC because_IN of_IN the_DT early_JJ settlement_NN ,_, the_DT three-month_JJ bills_NNS actually_RB have_VBP a_DT 93-day_JJ maturity_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT six-month_JJ bills_NNS have_VBP an_DT 184-day_JJ maturity_NN ._.

Here_RB are_VBP details_NNS of_IN yesterday_NN 's_POS three-month_JJ and_CC six-month_JJ bill_NN auction_NN :_:
Rates_NNS are_VBP determined_VBN by_IN the_DT difference_NN between_IN the_DT purchase_NN price_NN and_CC face_NN value_NN ._.
Thus_RB ,_, higher_JJR bidding_NN narrows_VBZ the_DT investor_NN 's_POS return_NN while_IN lower_JJR bidding_NN widens_VBZ it_PRP ._.
The_DT percentage_NN rates_NNS are_VBP calculated_VBN on_IN a_DT 360-day_JJ year_NN ,_, while_IN the_DT coupon_NN equivalent_JJ yield_NN is_VBZ based_VBN on_IN a_DT 365-day_JJ year_NN ._.

``_`` And_CC where_WRB we_PRP are_VBP is_VBZ bad_JJ ._. ''_''
Despite_IN valiant_JJ efforts_NNS by_IN Finance_NNP Minister_NNP Mailson_NNP Ferreira_NNP da_NNP Nobrega_NNP ,_, inflation_NN came_VBD to_TO 36_CD %_NN in_IN September_NNP alone_RB and_CC is_VBZ expected_VBN to_TO top_VB 1,000_CD %_NN for_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
That_DT might_MD have_VB been_VBN considered_VBN hyperinflation_NN not_RB long_RB ago_RB ,_, but_CC Argentina_NNP endured_VBD price_NN increases_NNS of_IN almost_RB 200_CD %_NN in_IN July_NNP before_IN bringing_VBG the_DT rate_NN down_RP sharply_RB in_IN August_NNP and_CC September_NNP ._.

For_IN instance_NN ,_, juries_NNS would_MD have_VB to_TO consider_VB specific_JJ ``_`` aggravating_JJ ''_'' and_CC ``_`` mitigating_JJ ''_'' factors_NNS before_IN deciding_VBG whether_IN to_TO condemn_VB someone_NN to_TO death_NN ._.
Since_IN that_DT 1976_CD ruling_NN ,_, 37_CD states_NNS have_VBP reintroduced_VBN the_DT death_NN penalty_NN ._.

The_DT Thurmond_NNP bill_NN would_MD establish_VB a_DT federally_RB administered_VBN death_NN sentence_NN for_IN 23_CD crimes_NNS ,_, most_JJS of_IN which_WDT were_VBD formerly_RB punishable_JJ by_IN death_NN under_IN federal_JJ statutes_NNS that_IN the_DT Supreme_NNP Court_NNP invalidated_VBD ._.

Revco_NNP D.S._NNP Inc._NNP ,_, the_DT drugstore_NN chain_NN that_WDT filed_VBD for_IN bankruptcy-court_NN protection_NN last_JJ year_NN ,_, received_VBD a_DT $_$ 925_CD million_CD offer_NN from_IN a_DT group_NN led_VBD by_IN Texas_NNP billionaire_NN Robert_NNP Bass_NNP ._.

``_`` Demand_NN from_IN Japan_NNP is_VBZ expected_VBN to_TO continue_VB strong_JJ ,_, but_CC not_RB from_IN other_JJ areas_NNS of_IN the_DT world_NN into_IN the_DT first_JJ quarter_NN of_IN next_JJ year_NN ,_, ''_'' he_PRP said_VBD ._.

However_RB ,_, traders_NNS disregarded_VBD a_DT potential_JJ production_NN disruption_NN in_IN Chile_NNP and_CC a_DT continued_VBN drop_NN in_IN inventories_NNS ._.

In_IN other_JJ commodity_NN markets_NNS yesterday_NN :_:

The_DT prices_NNS of_IN most_JJS corn_NN ,_, soybean_NN and_CC wheat_NN futures_NNS contracts_NNS dropped_VBD slightly_RB as_IN farmers_NNS in_IN the_DT Midwest_NNP continued_VBN to_TO rebuild_VB stockpiles_NNS that_WDT were_VBD depleted_VBN by_IN the_DT 1988_CD drought_NN ._.

COFFEE_NN :_:

According_VBG to_TO one_CD analyst_NN ,_, prices_NNS opened_VBD higher_RBR because_IN of_IN reports_NNS over_IN the_DT weekend_NN that_IN Brazil_NNP and_CC Colombia_NNP ,_, at_IN the_DT Pan-American_JJ summit_NN meeting_NN in_IN Costa_NNP Rica_NNP ,_, had_VBD agreed_VBN to_TO a_DT reduction_NN in_IN their_PRP$ coffee_NN export_NN quotas_NNS for_IN the_DT sake_NN of_IN creating_VBG a_DT new_JJ agreement_NN ._.

''_''

The_DT S&P_NNP 500_CD is_VBZ often_RB used_VBN in_IN arbitrage_NN strategies_NNS ._.
The_DT portion_NN of_IN OTC_NNP volume_NN attributable_JJ to_TO program_NN trading_NN is_VBZ n't_RB known_VBN ,_, as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ on_IN the_DT New_NNP York_NNP Stock_NNP Exchange_NNP ,_, where_WRB it_PRP amounted_VBD to_TO more_JJR than_IN 13_CD %_NN in_IN September_NNP ._.
Estimates_NNS from_IN traders_NNS put_VBD it_PRP at_IN less_JJR than_IN 5_CD %_NN of_IN Nasdaq_NNP 's_POS average_JJ daily_JJ volume_NN of_IN roughly_RB 133_CD million_CD shares_NNS ._.
Other_JJ market-maker_NN gripes_NNS :_: Program_NN trading_NN also_RB causes_VBZ the_DT Nasdaq_NNP Composite_NNP Index_NNP to_TO lose_VB ground_NN against_IN other_JJ segments_NNS of_IN the_DT stock_NN market_NN ._.
Because_IN of_IN program_NN trading_NN it_PRP is_VBZ more_RBR difficult_JJ to_TO trade_VB many_JJ OTC_NNP stocks_NNS without_IN sharp_JJ price_NN moves_NNS ,_, a_DT condition_NN known_VBN as_IN illiquidity_NN ._.
Moreover_RB ,_, the_DT price_NN volatility_NN that_WDT is_VBZ amplified_VBN by_IN program_NN trading_NN is_VBZ undercutting_VBG efforts_NNS to_TO woo_VB individual_JJ investors_NNS back_RB to_TO an_DT OTC_NNP market_NN that_WDT sorely_RB misses_VBZ them_PRP ._.
Some_DT of_IN these_DT problems_NNS are_VBP neither_DT new_JJ nor_CC unique_JJ to_TO the_DT OTC_NNP market_NN ._.
But_CC the_DT big_JJ ,_, often_RB tumultuous_JJ slide_NN in_IN stock_NN prices_NNS this_DT month_NN has_VBZ turned_VBN some_DT of_IN those_DT who_WP have_VBP been_VBN profiting_VBG from_IN the_DT practice_NN against_IN it_PRP ._.
Peter_NNP DaPuzzo_NNP ,_, head_NN of_IN retail_JJ equity_NN trading_NN at_IN Shearson_NNP Lehman_NNP Hutton_NNP ,_, acknowledges_VBZ that_IN he_PRP was_VBD n't_RB troubled_JJ by_IN program_NN trading_NN when_WRB it_PRP began_VBD in_IN the_DT pre-crash_JJ bull_NN market_NN because_IN it_PRP added_VBD liquidity_NN and_CC people_NNS were_VBD pleased_JJ to_TO see_VB stock_NN prices_NNS rising_NN ._.
``_`` We_PRP were_VBD n't_RB as_RB concerned_VBN until_IN they_PRP became_VBD sell_NN programs_NNS ,_, ''_'' says_VBZ Mr._NNP DaPuzzo_NNP ,_, who_WP now_RB thinks_VBZ it_PRP adds_VBZ unnecessary_JJ volatility_NN ._.
Shearson_NNP Lehman_NNP ,_, however_RB ,_, executes_VBZ program_NN trades_NNS for_IN clients_NNS ._.
Merrill_NNP Lynch_NNP ,_, Goldman_NNP Sachs_NNP and_CC Kidder_NNP Peabody_NNP ,_, in_IN addition_NN to_TO Shearson_NNP ,_, do_VBP program-trade_JJ OTC_NNP stocks_NNS ._.
Shearson_NNP ,_, Merrill_NNP Lynch_NNP and_CC Goldman_NNP Sachs_NNP say_VBP they_PRP do_VBP so_RB only_RB for_IN customers_NNS ,_, however_RB ._.
Kidder_NNP Peabody_NNP does_VBZ program_NN trading_NN for_IN its_PRP$ own_JJ as_RB well_RB as_IN clients_NNS '_POS accounts_NNS ._.
Of_IN course_NN ,_, there_EX were_VBD sell_NN programs_NNS in_IN past_JJ years_NNS ,_, too_RB ,_, but_CC they_PRP seem_VBP to_TO hurt_VB market_NN makers_NNS more_RBR painfully_RB these_DT days_NNS ._.
That_DT 's_VBZ largely_RB because_IN of_IN defensive_JJ measures_NNS they_PRP adopted_VBD after_IN the_DT 1987_CD crash_NN ,_, when_WRB individual_JJ investors_NNS fled_VBD the_DT market_NN and_CC trading_NN activity_NN dwindled_VBD ._.
Market_NN makers_NNS ,_, to_TO cut_VB costs_NNS ,_, slashed_VBD inventories_NNS of_IN stocks_NNS they_PRP keep_VBP on_IN hand_NN to_TO sell_VB investors_NNS when_WRB other_JJ holders_NNS are_VBP n't_RB selling_VBG ._.

``_`` The_DT reinsurance_NN market_NN has_VBZ been_VBN bloodied_VBN by_IN disasters_NNS ''_'' in_IN the_DT U.S._NNP as_RB well_RB as_IN in_IN Great_NNP Britain_NNP and_CC Europe_NNP ,_, says_VBZ Thomas_NNP Rosencrants_NNP ,_, director_NN of_IN research_NN at_IN Interstate\/Johnson_NNP Lane_NNP Inc._NNP in_IN Atlanta_NNP ._.

Insurers_NNP buy_VBP this_DT insurance_NN protection_NN for_IN themselves_PRP by_IN giving_VBG up_RP a_DT portion_NN of_IN the_DT premiums_NNS they_PRP collect_VBP on_IN a_DT policy_NN to_TO another_DT firm_NN --_: a_DT reinsurance_NN company_NN ,_, which_WDT ,_, in_IN turn_NN ,_, accepts_VBZ a_DT portion_NN of_IN any_DT losses_NNS resulting_VBG from_IN this_DT policy_NN ._.
Insurers_NNP ,_, such_JJ as_IN Cigna_NNP Corp._NNP ,_, Transamerica_NNP Corp_NNP ,_, and_CC Aetna_NNP Life_NNP &_CC Casualty_NNP Co._NNP ,_, buy_VBP reinsurance_NN from_IN other_JJ U.S.-based_JJ companies_NNS and_CC Lloyd_NNP 's_VBZ of_IN London_NNP for_IN one_CD catastrophe_NN at_IN a_DT time_NN ._.

SHORT-TERM_JJ MUNICIPALS_NNS :_:
Investors_NNS with_IN a_DT heavy_JJ tax_NN load_NN should_MD take_VB out_RP their_PRP$ calculators_NNS ._.
Yields_NNS on_IN municipal_JJ bonds_NNS can_MD be_VB higher_JJR than_IN after-tax_JJ yields_NNS on_IN CDs_NNS for_IN maturities_NNS of_IN perhaps_RB one_CD to_TO five_CD years_NNS ._.
That_DT 's_VBZ because_RB municipal-bond_JJ interest_NN is_VBZ exempt_JJ from_IN federal_JJ income_NN tax_NN --_: and_CC from_IN state_NN and_CC local_JJ taxes_NNS too_RB ,_, for_IN in-state_JJ investors_NNS ._.
For_IN an_DT investor_NN paying_VBG tax_NN at_IN a_DT 33_CD %_NN rate_NN ,_, a_DT seemingly_RB puny_JJ 6_CD %_NN yield_NN on_IN a_DT one-year_JJ muni_NNS is_VBZ equivalent_JJ to_TO a_DT taxable_JJ 9_CD %_NN ._.
Rates_NNS approach_VBP 6.5_CD %_NN on_IN five-year_JJ municipals_NNS ._.
Some_DT of_IN the_DT more_RBR cautious_JJ CD_NNP holders_NNS might_MD like_VB ``_`` pre-refunded_JJ ''_'' municipals_NNS ._.

``_`` It_PRP 's_VBZ a_DT no-brainer_NN :_: You_PRP do_VBP n't_RB have_VB to_TO worry_VB about_IN diversification_NN ;_: you_PRP do_VBP n't_RB have_VB to_TO worry_VB about_IN quality_NN ,_, ''_'' says_VBZ Steven_NNP J._NNP Hueglin_NNP ,_, executive_JJ vice_NN president_NN of_IN the_DT New_NNP York_NNP bond_NN firm_NN of_IN Gabriele_NNP ,_, Hueglin_NNP &_CC Cashman_NNP Inc_NNP ._.
Consider_VB a_DT ``_`` laddered_JJ ''_'' bond_NN portfolio_NN ,_, with_IN issues_NNS maturing_VBG in_IN ,_, say_VB ,_, 1992_CD ,_, 1993_CD and_CC 1994_CD ,_, advises_VBZ Malcolm_NNP A._NN Makin_NNP ,_, a_DT Westerly_NNP ,_, R.I._NNP ,_, financial_JJ planner_NN ._.
The_DT idea_NN is_VBZ to_TO have_VB money_NN rolling_VBG over_RP each_DT year_NN at_IN prevailing_JJ interest_NN rates_NNS ._.
BOND_NN FUNDS_NNS :_:
Bond_NN mutual_JJ funds_NNS offer_VBP diversification_NN and_CC are_VBP easy_JJ to_TO buy_VB and_CC sell_VB ._.
That_DT makes_VBZ them_PRP a_DT reasonable_JJ option_NN for_IN investors_NNS who_WP will_MD accept_VB some_DT risk_NN of_IN price_NN fluctuation_NN in_IN order_NN to_TO make_VB a_DT bet_NN that_IN interest_NN rates_NNS will_MD decline_VB over_IN the_DT next_JJ year_NN or_CC so_RB ._.
Buyers_NNS can_MD look_VB forward_RP to_TO double-digit_JJ annual_JJ returns_NNS if_IN they_PRP are_VBP right_JJ ._.
But_CC they_PRP will_MD have_VB disappointing_JJ returns_NNS or_CC even_JJ losses_NNS if_IN interest_NN rates_NNS rise_VBP instead_RB ._.
Bond_NN resale_NN prices_NNS ,_, and_CC thus_RB fund_NN share_NN prices_NNS ,_, move_VBP in_IN the_DT opposite_JJ direction_NN from_IN rates_NNS ._.
The_DT price_NN movements_NNS get_VB bigger_JJR as_IN the_DT maturity_NN of_IN the_DT securities_NNS lengthens_VBZ ._.
Consider_VB ,_, for_IN instance_NN ,_, two_CD bond_NN funds_NNS from_IN Vanguard_NNP Group_NNP of_IN Investment_NNP Cos._NNP that_WDT were_VBD both_DT yielding_VBG 8.6_CD %_NN on_IN a_DT recent_JJ day_NN ._.
The_DT Short_NNP Term_NNP Bond_NNP Fund_NNP ,_, with_IN an_DT average_JJ maturity_NN of_IN 2_CD 1\/2_CD years_NNS ,_, would_MD deliver_VB a_DT total_JJ return_NN for_IN one_CD year_NN of_IN about_RB 10.6_CD %_NN if_IN rates_NNS drop_VBP one_CD percentage_NN point_NN and_CC a_DT one-year_JJ return_NN of_IN about_RB 6.6_CD %_NN if_IN rates_NNS rise_VBP by_IN the_DT same_JJ amount_NN ._.
But_CC ,_, in_IN the_DT same_JJ circumstances_NNS ,_, the_DT returns_NNS would_MD be_VB a_DT more_RBR extreme_JJ 14.6_CD %_NN and_CC 2.6_CD %_NN for_IN the_DT Vanguard_NNP Bond_NNP Market_NNP Fund_NNP ,_, with_IN its_PRP$ 12_CD 1\/2-year_JJ average_JJ maturity_NN ._.
``_`` You_PRP get_VB equity-like_JJ returns_NNS ''_'' from_IN bonds_NNS if_IN you_PRP guess_VB right_RB on_IN rates_NNS ,_, says_VBZ James_NNP E._NNP Wilson_NNP ,_, a_DT Columbia_NNP ,_, S.C._NNP ,_, planner_NN ._.
If_IN interest_NN rates_NNS do_VBP n't_RB change_VB ,_, bond_NN fund_NN investors_NNS '_POS returns_NNS will_MD be_VB about_RB equal_JJ to_TO the_DT funds_NNS '_POS current_JJ yields_NNS ._.
DEFERRED_JJ ANNUITIES_NNS :_:
These_DT insurance_NN company_NN contracts_NNS feature_VBP some_DT of_IN the_DT same_JJ tax_NN benefits_NNS and_CC restrictions_NNS as_IN non-deductible_JJ individual_JJ retirement_NN accounts_NNS :_: Investment_NN gains_NNS are_VBP compounded_VBN without_IN tax_NN consequences_NNS until_IN money_NN is_VBZ withdrawn_VBN ,_, but_CC a_DT 10_CD %_NN penalty_NN tax_NN is_VBZ imposed_VBN on_IN withdrawals_NNS made_VBN before_IN age_NN 59_CD 1\/2_CD ._.
Aimed_VBN specifically_RB at_IN CD_NNP holders_NNS are_VBP so-called_JJ CD-type_JJ annuities_NNS ,_, or_CC certificates_NNS of_IN annuity_NN ._.
An_DT interest_NN rate_NN is_VBZ guaranteed_VBN for_IN between_IN one_CD and_CC seven_CD years_NNS ,_, after_IN which_WDT holders_NNS get_VBP 30_CD days_NNS to_TO choose_VB another_DT guarantee_NN period_NN or_CC to_TO switch_VB to_TO another_DT insurer_NN 's_POS contract_NN without_IN the_DT surrender_NN charges_NNS that_WDT are_VBP common_JJ to_TO annuities_NNS ._.
Some_DT current_JJ rates_NNS exceed_VBP those_DT on_IN CDs_NNS ._.

MONEY_NN MARKET_NN FUNDS_NNS :_:
That_DT 's_VBZ right_JJ ,_, money_NN market_NN mutual_JJ funds_NNS ._.
The_DT conventional_JJ wisdom_NN is_VBZ to_TO go_VB into_IN money_NN funds_NNS when_WRB rates_NNS are_VBP rising_VBG and_CC shift_VB out_RB at_IN times_NNS such_JJ as_IN the_DT present_NN ,_, when_WRB rates_NNS seem_VBP headed_VBN down_RB ._.
With_IN average_JJ maturities_NNS of_IN a_DT month_NN or_CC so_RB ,_, money_NN funds_NNS offer_VBP fixed_JJ share_NN prices_NNS and_CC floating_VBG returns_NNS that_IN track_VBP market_NN interest_NN rates_NNS ,_, with_IN a_DT slight_JJ lag_NN ._.
Still_RB ,_, today_NN 's_POS highest-yielding_JJ money_NN funds_NNS may_MD beat_VB CDs_NNS over_IN the_DT next_JJ year_NN even_RB if_IN rates_NNS fall_VBP ,_, says_VBZ Guy_NNP Witman_NNP ,_, an_DT editor_NN of_IN the_DT Bond_NNP Market_NNP Advisor_NNP newsletter_NN in_IN Atlanta_NNP ._.

Step_NN 1_CD cleans_VBZ up_RP our_PRP$ books_NNS ._.
Our_PRP$ five-year_JJ plan_NN contains_VBZ three_CD accounting_NN devices_NNS --_: negative_JJ money_NN ,_, an_DT above_JJ guidance_NN management_NN reserve_NN and_CC optimistic_JJ inflation_NN estimates_NNS --_: which_WDT understate_VBP the_DT spending_NN the_DT Pentagon_NNP has_VBZ committed_VBN itself_PRP to_TO by_IN almost_RB $_$ 100_CD billion_CD ._.

It_PRP is_VBZ known_VBN in_IN the_DT Pentagon_NNP as_IN the_DT ``_`` negative_JJ wedge_NN ._. ''_''
The_DT Pentagon_NNP argues_VBZ that_IN the_DT negative_JJ wedge_NN is_VBZ the_DT net_JJ effect_NN of_IN $_$ 22_CD billion_CD in_IN the_DT as-yet_RB unidentified_JJ procurement_NN reductions_NNS that_WDT it_PRP intends_VBZ to_TO find_VB in_IN future_JJ years_NNS and_CC $_$ 23_CD billion_CD in_IN an_DT ``_`` above_JJ guidance_NN ''_'' management_NN reserve_NN that_WDT accounts_VBZ for_IN undefined_JJ programs_NNS that_WDT will_MD materialize_VB in_IN the_DT future_NN ._.
The_DT 1990_CD plan_NN also_RB assumes_VBZ inflation_NN will_MD decline_VB to_TO 1.7_CD %_NN by_IN 1994_CD ._.
Most_JJS forecasters_NNS ,_, including_VBG those_DT in_IN the_DT Congressional_NNP Budget_NNP Office_NNP ,_, assume_VBP inflation_NN will_MD be_VB in_IN excess_NN of_IN 4_CD %_NN in_IN each_DT of_IN those_DT five_CD years_NNS ._.

By_IN adding_VBG the_DT negative_JJ wedge_NN and_CC recalculating_VBG the_DT remaining_VBG program_NN using_VBG a_DT more_RBR probable_JJ inflation_NN estimate_NN ,_, we_PRP arrive_VBP at_IN a_DT baseline_JJ program_NN costing_VBG $_$ 1.7_CD trillion_CD between_IN 1990_CD and_CC 1994_CD ._.

Scenario_NN 1_CD ,_, known_VBN as_IN the_DT ``_`` Constant_JJ Dollar_NN Freeze_NN ,_, ''_'' reimburses_VBZ the_DT Pentagon_NNP for_IN inflation_NN only_RB --_: it_PRP slopes_VBZ upward_RB at_IN 4_CD %_NN per_IN year_NN ._.

This_DT can_MD be_VB thought_VBN of_IN as_IN a_DT pessimistic_JJ prediction_NN ,_, perhaps_RB driven_VBN by_IN the_DT sequestering_NN effects_NNS of_IN the_DT Gramm-Rudman_NNP deficit_NN reduction_NN law_NN or_CC possibly_RB a_DT relaxation_NN of_IN tensions_NNS with_IN the_DT Soviet_NNP Union_NNP ._.

This_DT exercise_NN would_MD reveal_VB the_DT true_JJ cost_NN of_IN a_DT particular_JJ program_NN by_IN forcing_VBG the_DT strategists_NNS to_TO make_VB hard_JJ decisions_NNS ._.
If_IN ,_, for_IN example_NN ,_, they_PRP choose_VBP to_TO keep_VB the_DT B-2_NNP Stealth_NNP bomber_NN ,_, they_PRP would_MD have_VB to_TO sacrifice_VB more_JJR and_CC more_JJR other_JJ programs_NNS --_: such_JJ as_IN carrier_NN battlegroups_NNS or_CC army_NN divisions_NNS --_: as_IN they_PRP moved_VBD toward_IN lower_JJR budget_NN levels_NNS ._.
These_DT trade-offs_NNS would_MD evolve_VB priorities_NNS by_IN revealing_VBG when_WRB the_DT cost_NN of_IN the_DT B-2_NNP became_VBD prohibitive_JJ ._.

The_DT Securities_NNPS and_CC Futures_NNPS Commission_NNP ,_, a_DT government_NN watchdog_NN set_VBD up_RP after_IN the_DT 1987_CD crash_NN to_TO try_VB to_TO restore_VB confidence_NN and_CC order_NN to_TO Hong_NNP Kong_NNP 's_POS markets_NNS ,_, had_VBD been_VBN expected_VBN to_TO give_VB the_DT contract_NN conditional_JJ approval_NN last_JJ week_NN ._.

During_IN the_DT Third_NNP Reich_NNP ,_, the_DT Rothschilds_NNPS were_VBD a_DT target_NN of_IN Nazi_JJ propaganda_NN against_IN Jewish_JJ financiers_NNS ._.

A_DT stock-index_NN future_NN is_VBZ a_DT contract_NN to_TO buy_VB or_CC sell_VB the_DT market_NN value_NN of_IN a_DT basket_NN of_IN stocks_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN the_DT Standard_NNP &_CC Poor_NNP 's_POS 500-stock_JJ index_NN ._.

The_DT proposed_JJ legislation_NN is_VBZ aimed_VBN at_IN rectifying_VBG some_DT of_IN the_DT inequities_NNS in_IN the_DT current_JJ land-ownership_NN system_NN ._.
Highlights_NNS of_IN the_DT bills_NNS ,_, as_RB currently_RB framed_VBN ,_, are_VBP :_: --_: A_DT restriction_NN on_IN the_DT amount_NN of_IN real_JJ estate_NN one_CD family_NN can_MD own_VB ,_, to_TO 660_CD square_NN meters_NNS in_IN the_DT nation_NN 's_POS six_CD largest_JJS cities_NNS ,_, but_CC more_JJR in_IN smaller_JJR cities_NNS and_CC rural_JJ areas_NNS ._.

--_: Taxes_NNS of_IN between_IN 15_CD %_NN and_CC 50_CD %_NN a_DT year_NN on_IN ``_`` excessive_JJ ''_'' profits_NNS from_IN the_DT resale_NN of_IN property_NN ,_, or_CC the_DT sale_NN of_IN idle_JJ land_NN to_TO the_DT government_NN ._.
The_DT government_NN defines_VBZ excessive_JJ profits_NNS as_IN those_DT above_IN the_DT average_NN realized_VBN for_IN other_JJ similar-sized_JJ properties_NNS in_IN an_DT area_NN ._.
--_: Grace_NN periods_NNS ranging_VBG from_IN two_CD to_TO five_CD years_NNS before_IN the_DT full_JJ scope_NN of_IN the_DT penalties_NNS takes_VBZ effect_NN ._.

The_DT government_NN is_VBZ sharpening_VBG its_PRP$ newest_JJS weapon_NN against_IN white-collar_JJ defendants_NNS :_: the_DT power_NN to_TO prevent_VB them_PRP from_IN paying_VBG their_PRP$ legal_JJ bills_NNS ._.
And_CC defense_NN lawyers_NNS are_VBP warning_VBG that_IN they_PRP wo_MD n't_RB stick_VB around_RP if_IN they_PRP do_VBP n't_RB get_VB paid_VBN ._.
The_DT issue_NN has_VBZ come_VBN to_TO a_DT boil_NN in_IN Newark_NNP ,_, N.J._NNP ,_, where_WRB federal_JJ prosecutors_NNS have_VBP warned_VBN lawyers_NNS for_IN Eddie_NNP Antar_NNP that_IN if_IN the_DT founder_NN and_CC former_JJ chairman_NN of_IN Crazy_NNP Eddie_NNP Inc._NNP is_VBZ indicted_VBN ,_, the_DT government_NN may_MD move_VB to_TO seize_VB the_DT money_NN that_IN Mr._NNP Antar_NNP is_VBZ using_VBG to_TO pay_VB legal_JJ fees_NNS ._.

In_IN those_DT cases_NNS ,_, the_DT high_JJ court_NN ruled_VBD that_DT federal_JJ law_NN gives_VBZ prosecutors_NNS broad_JJ authority_NN to_TO seize_VB assets_NNS of_IN people_NNS accused_VBN of_IN racketeering_NN and_CC drug-related_JJ crimes_NNS ,_, including_VBG fees_NNS paid_VBN to_TO lawyers_NNS before_IN an_DT indictment_NN ._.
If_IN the_DT government_NN succeeds_VBZ in_IN seizing_VBG Mr._NNP Antar_NNP 's_POS assets_NNS ,_, he_PRP could_MD be_VB left_VBN without_IN top-flight_JJ legal_JJ representation_NN ,_, because_IN his_PRP$ attorneys_NNS are_VBP likely_JJ to_TO quit_VB ,_, according_VBG to_TO individuals_NNS familiar_JJ with_IN the_DT case_NN ._.
A_DT seizure_NN also_RB would_MD make_VB the_DT case_NN the_DT largest_JJS --_: and_CC one_CD of_IN the_DT first_JJ --_: in_IN which_WDT lawyers_NNS '_POS fees_NNS have_VBP been_VBN confiscated_VBN in_IN a_DT prosecution_NN unrelated_JJ to_TO drugs_NNS ._.
``_`` The_DT people_NNS who_WP suffer_VBP in_IN the_DT short_JJ run_NN are_VBP defendants_NNS ,_, but_CC the_DT people_NNS who_WP suffer_VBP in_IN the_DT long_JJ run_NN are_VBP all_DT of_IN the_DT people_NNS ,_, because_IN there_EX wo_MD n't_RB be_VB a_DT vigorous_JJ private_JJ bar_NN to_TO defend_VB the_DT Bill_NNP of_IN Rights_NNPS ,_, ''_'' says_VBZ Gerald_NNP Lefcourt_NNP ,_, a_DT criminal_NN defense_NN attorney_NN who_WP says_VBZ he_PRP has_VBZ turned_VBN down_RP a_DT number_NN of_IN cases_NNS to_TO avoid_VB possible_JJ fee_NN seizures_NNS ._.
Mr._NNP Antar_NNP is_VBZ being_VBG investigated_VBN by_IN a_DT federal_JJ grand_JJ jury_NN in_IN Newark_NNP ,_, where_WRB prosecutors_NNS have_VBP told_VBN him_PRP that_IN they_PRP may_MD soon_RB seek_VB an_DT indictment_NN on_IN racketeering_NN and_CC securities_NNS fraud_NN charges_NNS ._.
Under_IN the_DT Racketeer_NNP Influenced_NNP and_CC Corrupt_NNP Organizations_NNPS law_NN ,_, or_CC RICO_NNP ,_, the_DT government_NN has_VBZ the_DT authority_NN to_TO seek_VB to_TO freeze_VB or_CC seize_VB a_DT defendant_NN 's_POS assets_NNS before_IN trial_NN ._.
According_VBG to_TO individuals_NNS familiar_JJ with_IN Mr._NNP Antar_NNP 's_POS case_NN ,_, prosecutors_NNS issued_VBD their_PRP$ warning_NN this_DT week_NN after_IN one_CD of_IN Mr._NNP Antar_NNP 's_POS attorneys_NNS asked_VBD whether_IN legal_JJ fees_NNS might_MD be_VB subject_JJ to_TO seizure_NN ._.

Prosecutors_NNS have_VBP told_VBN Mr._NNP Antar_NNP 's_POS attorneys_NNS that_IN they_PRP believe_VBP Mr._NNP Antar_NNP 's_VBZ allegedly_RB ill-gotten_JJ gains_NNS are_VBP so_RB great_JJ that_IN any_DT money_NN he_PRP has_VBZ used_VBN to_TO pay_VB attorneys_NNS derives_VBZ from_IN illegal_JJ activities_NNS ._.
Therefore_RB ,_, they_PRP said_VBD ,_, the_DT money_NN can_MD be_VB taken_VBN from_IN the_DT lawyers_NNS even_RB after_IN they_PRP are_VBP paid_VBN ._.
Justin_NNP Feldman_NNP and_CC Jack_NNP Arseneault_NNP ,_, attorneys_NNS for_IN Mr._NNP Antar_NNP ,_, both_DT declined_VBD to_TO comment_VB on_IN the_DT matter_NN ._.
In_IN Newark_NNP ,_, U.S._NNP Attorney_NNP Samuel_NNP A._NN Alito_NNP said_VBD ,_, ``_`` I_PRP do_VBP n't_RB think_VB there_EX 's_VBZ any_DT legal_JJ reason_NN to_TO limit_VB forfeiture_NN of_IN attorney_NN 's_POS fees_NNS to_TO drug_NN cases_NNS ._. ''_''

''_''
Mr._NNP Antar_NNP was_VBD charged_VBN last_JJ month_NN in_IN a_DT civil_JJ suit_NN filed_VBN in_IN federal_JJ court_NN in_IN Newark_NNP by_IN the_DT Securities_NNPS and_CC Exchange_NNP Commission_NNP ._.
In_IN that_DT suit_NN ,_, the_DT SEC_NNP accused_VBD Mr._NNP Antar_NNP of_IN engaging_VBG in_IN a_DT ``_`` massive_JJ financial_JJ fraud_NN ''_'' to_TO overstate_VB the_DT earnings_NNS of_IN Crazy_NNP Eddie_NNP ,_, Edison_NNP ,_, N.J._NNP ,_, over_IN a_DT three-year_JJ period_NN ._.
Through_IN his_PRP$ lawyers_NNS ,_, Mr._NNP Antar_NNP has_VBZ denied_VBN allegations_NNS in_IN the_DT SEC_NNP suit_NN and_CC in_IN civil_JJ suits_NNS previously_RB filed_VBN by_IN shareholders_NNS against_IN Mr._NNP Antar_NNP and_CC others_NNS ._.
The_DT SEC_NNP has_VBZ alleged_VBN that_IN Mr._NNP Antar_NNP aimed_VBD to_TO pump_VB up_RP the_DT company_NN 's_POS stock_NN price_NN through_IN false_JJ financial_JJ statements_NNS in_IN order_NN to_TO sell_VB his_PRP$ stake_NN and_CC reap_VB huge_JJ profits_NNS ._.
Mr._NNP Antar_NNP ,_, the_DT SEC_NNP said_VBD ,_, made_VBD more_JJR than_IN $_$ 60_CD million_CD from_IN the_DT sale_NN of_IN his_PRP$ shares_NNS between_IN 1985_CD and_CC 1987_CD ._.
The_DT Justice_NNP Department_NNP has_VBZ emphasized_VBN that_IN the_DT government_NN 's_POS fee-forfeiture_NN power_NN is_VBZ to_TO be_VB used_VBN sparingly_RB ._.
According_VBG to_TO department_NN policy_NN ,_, prosecutors_NNS must_MD make_VB a_DT strong_JJ showing_NN that_IN lawyers_NNS '_POS fees_NNS came_VBD from_IN assets_NNS tainted_VBN by_IN illegal_JJ profits_NNS before_IN any_DT attempts_NNS at_IN seizure_NN are_VBP made_VBN ._.
Still_RB ,_, criminal_JJ defense_NN lawyers_NNS worry_VBP that_IN defendants_NNS are_VBP being_VBG deprived_VBN of_IN their_PRP$ Sixth_NNP Amendment_NNP right_NN to_TO counsel_NN and_CC a_DT fair_JJ trial_NN if_IN the_DT government_NN can_MD seize_VB lawyers_NNS '_POS fees_NNS ._.
They_PRP also_RB worry_VBP that_IN if_IN the_DT government_NN applies_VBZ asset-forfeiture_NN laws_NNS broadly_RB ,_, the_DT best_JJS defense_NN lawyers_NNS will_MD be_VB unwilling_JJ to_TO take_VB criminal_JJ cases_NNS unless_IN they_PRP are_VBP assured_VBN of_IN being_VBG paid_VBN ._.
The_DT stock_NN market_NN correction_NN of_IN Oct._NNP 13_CD ,_, 1989_CD ,_, was_VBD a_DT grim_JJ reminder_NN of_IN the_DT Oct._NNP 19_CD ,_, 1987_CD market_NN collapse_NN ._.
Since_IN ,_, like_IN earthquakes_NNS ,_, stock_NN market_NN disturbances_NNS will_MD always_RB be_VB with_IN us_PRP ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ prudent_JJ to_TO take_VB all_DT possible_JJ precautions_NNS against_IN another_DT such_JJ market_NN collapse_NN ._.
In_IN general_JJ ,_, markets_NNS function_VBP well_RB and_CC adjust_VBP smoothly_RB to_TO changing_VBG economic_JJ and_CC financial_JJ circumstances_NNS ._.
But_CC there_EX are_VBP times_NNS when_WRB they_PRP seize_VBP up_RP ,_, and_CC panicky_JJ sellers_NNS can_MD not_RB find_VB buyers_NNS ._.
That_DT 's_VBZ just_RB what_WP happened_VBD in_IN the_DT October_NNP 1987_CD crash_NN ._.
As_IN the_DT market_NN tumbled_VBD ,_, disorderly_JJ market_NN conditions_NNS prevailed_VBD :_: The_DT margins_NNS between_IN buying_NN bids_NNS and_CC selling_NN bids_NNS widened_VBD ;_: trading_NN in_IN many_JJ stocks_NNS was_VBD suspended_VBN ;_: orders_NNS took_VBD unduly_RB long_JJ to_TO be_VB executed_VBN ;_: and_CC many_JJ specialists_NNS stopped_VBD trading_VBG altogether_RB ._.
These_DT failures_NNS in_IN turn_NN contributed_VBD to_TO the_DT fall_NN in_IN the_DT market_NN averages_NNS :_: Uncertainty_NN extracted_VBD an_DT extra_JJ risk_NN premium_NN and_CC margin-calls_NNS triggered_VBD additional_JJ selling_NN pressures_NNS ._.
The_DT situation_NN was_VBD like_IN that_DT of_IN a_DT skier_NN who_WP is_VBZ thrown_VBN slightly_RB off_IN balance_NN by_IN an_DT unexpected_JJ bump_NN on_IN the_DT slope_NN ._.
His_PRP$ skis_NNS spread_VBP farther_RBR and_CC farther_RBR apart_RB --_: just_RB as_IN buy-sell_JJ spreads_NNS widen_VBP during_IN a_DT financial_JJ panic_NN --_: and_CC soon_RB he_PRP is_VBZ out_IN of_IN control_NN ._.
Unable_JJ to_TO stop_VB his_PRP$ accelerating_VBG descent_NN ,_, he_PRP crashes_VBZ ._.
After_IN the_DT 1987_CD crash_NN ,_, and_CC as_IN a_DT result_NN of_IN the_DT recommendations_NNS of_IN many_JJ studies_NNS ,_, ``_`` circuit_NN breakers_NNS ''_'' were_VBD devised_VBN to_TO allow_VB market_NN participants_NNS to_TO regroup_VB and_CC restore_VB orderly_JJ market_NN conditions_NNS ._.
It_PRP 's_VBZ doubtful_JJ ,_, though_IN ,_, whether_IN circuit_NN breakers_NNS do_VBP any_DT real_JJ good_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT additional_JJ time_NN they_PRP provide_VBP even_RB more_JJR order_NN imbalances_NNS might_MD pile_VB up_RP ,_, as_IN would-be_JJ sellers_NNS finally_RB get_VB their_PRP$ broker_NN on_IN the_DT phone_NN ._.
Instead_RB ,_, an_DT appropriate_JJ institution_NN should_MD be_VB charged_VBN with_IN the_DT job_NN of_IN preventing_VBG chaos_NN in_IN the_DT market_NN :_: the_DT Federal_NNP Reserve_NNP ._.
The_DT availability_NN of_IN timely_JJ assistance_NN --_: of_IN a_DT backstop_NN --_: can_MD help_VB markets_NNS retain_VB their_PRP$ resilience_NN ._.
The_DT Fed_NNP already_RB buys_VBZ and_CC sells_VBZ foreign_JJ exchange_NN to_TO prevent_VB disorderly_JJ conditions_NNS in_IN foreign-exchange_NN markets_NNS ._.
The_DT Fed_NNP has_VBZ assumed_VBN a_DT similar_JJ responsibility_NN in_IN the_DT market_NN for_IN government_NN securities_NNS ._.
The_DT stock_NN market_NN is_VBZ the_DT only_RB major_JJ market_NN without_IN a_DT market-maker_NN of_IN unchallenged_JJ liquidity_NN or_CC a_DT buyer_NN of_IN last_JJ resort_NN ._.
This_DT does_VBZ not_RB mean_VB that_IN the_DT Federal_NNP Reserve_NNP does_VBZ not_RB already_RB play_VB an_DT important_JJ indirect_JJ role_NN in_IN the_DT stock_NN market_NN ._.
In_IN 1987_CD ,_, it_PRP pumped_VBD billions_NNS into_IN the_DT markets_NNS through_IN open_JJ market_NN operations_NNS and_CC the_DT discount_NN window_NN ._.
It_PRP lent_VBD money_NN to_TO banks_NNS and_CC encouraged_VBD them_PRP to_TO make_VB funds_NNS available_JJ to_TO brokerage_NN houses_NNS ._.
They_PRP ,_, in_IN turn_NN ,_, lent_VBD money_NN to_TO their_PRP$ customers_NNS --_: who_WP were_VBD supposed_VBN to_TO recognize_VB the_DT opportunity_NN to_TO make_VB a_DT profit_NN in_IN the_DT turmoil_NN and_CC buy_VB shares_NNS ._.
The_DT Fed_NNP also_RB has_VBZ the_DT power_NN to_TO set_VB margin_NN requirements_NNS ._.
But_CC would_MD n't_RB it_PRP be_VB more_RBR efficient_JJ and_CC effective_JJ to_TO supply_VB such_JJ support_NN to_TO the_DT stock_NN market_NN directly_RB ?_.
Instead_RB of_IN flooding_VBG the_DT entire_JJ economy_NN with_IN liquidity_NN ,_, and_CC thereby_RB increasing_VBG the_DT danger_NN of_IN inflation_NN ,_, the_DT Fed_NNP could_MD support_VB the_DT stock_NN market_NN directly_RB by_IN buying_VBG market_NN averages_NNS in_IN the_DT futures_NNS market_NN ,_, thus_RB stabilizing_VBG the_DT market_NN as_IN a_DT whole_NN ._.
The_DT stock_NN market_NN is_VBZ certainly_RB not_RB too_RB big_JJ for_IN the_DT Fed_NNP to_TO handle_VB ._.
The_DT foreign-exchange_NN and_CC government_NN securities_NNS markets_NNS are_VBP vastly_RB larger_JJR ._.
Daily_JJ trading_NN volume_NN in_IN the_DT New_NNP York_NNP foreign_JJ exchange_NN market_NN is_VBZ $_$ 130_CD billion_CD ._.
The_DT daily_JJ volume_NN for_IN Treasury_NNP Securities_NNPS is_VBZ about_IN $_$ 110_CD billion_CD ._.
The_DT combined_JJ value_NN of_IN daily_JJ equity_NN trading_NN on_IN the_DT New_NNP York_NNP Exchange_NNP ,_, the_DT American_NNP Stock_NNP Exchange_NNP and_CC the_DT NASDAQ_NNP over-the-counter_JJ market_NN ranges_VBZ between_IN $_$ 7_CD billion_CD and_CC $_$ 10_CD billion_CD ._.
The_DT $_$ 13_CD billion_CD the_DT Fed_NNP injected_VBD into_IN the_DT money_NN markets_NNS after_IN the_DT 1987_CD crash_NN is_VBZ more_RBR than_IN enough_JJ to_TO buy_VB all_PDT the_DT stocks_NNS traded_VBN on_IN a_DT typical_JJ day_NN ._.
More_RBR carefully_RB targeted_VBN intervention_NN might_MD actually_RB reduce_VB the_DT need_NN for_IN government_NN action_NN ._.
And_CC taking_VBG more_RBR direct_JJ action_NN has_VBZ the_DT advantage_NN of_IN avoiding_VBG sharp_JJ increases_NNS in_IN the_DT money_NN supply_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN happened_VBN in_IN October_NNP 1987_CD ._.
The_DT Fed_NNP 's_POS stock_NN market_NN role_NN ought_MD not_RB to_TO be_VB very_RB ambitious_JJ ._.
It_PRP should_MD seek_VB only_RB to_TO maintain_VB the_DT functioning_NN of_IN markets_NNS --_: not_RB to_TO prop_VB up_RP the_DT Dow_NNP Jones_NNP or_CC New_NNP York_NNP Stock_NNP Exchange_NNP averages_NNS at_IN a_DT particular_JJ level_NN ._.
The_DT Fed_NNP should_MD guard_VB against_IN systemic_JJ risk_NN ,_, but_CC not_RB against_IN the_DT risks_NNS inherent_JJ in_IN individual_JJ stocks_NNS ._.
It_PRP would_MD be_VB inappropriate_JJ for_IN the_DT government_NN or_CC the_DT central_JJ bank_NN to_TO buy_VB or_CC sell_VB IBM_NNP or_CC General_NNP Motors_NNPS shares_NNS ._.
Instead_RB ,_, the_DT Fed_NNP could_MD buy_VB the_DT broad_JJ market_NN composites_NNS in_IN the_DT futures_NNS market_NN ._.
The_DT increased_VBN demand_NN would_MD normalize_VB trading_NN and_CC stabilize_VB prices_NNS ._.
Stabilizing_VBG the_DT derivative_JJ markets_NNS would_MD tend_VB to_TO stabilize_VB the_DT primary_JJ market_NN ._.
The_DT Fed_NNP would_MD eliminate_VB the_DT cause_NN of_IN the_DT potential_JJ panic_NN rather_RB than_IN attempting_VBG to_TO treat_VB the_DT symptom_NN --_: the_DT liquidity_NN of_IN the_DT banks_NNS ._.
Disorderly_JJ market_NN conditions_NNS could_MD be_VB observed_VBN quite_RB frequently_RB in_IN foreign_JJ exchange_NN markets_NNS in_IN the_DT 1960s_NNS and_CC 1970s_NNS ._.
But_CC since_IN the_DT member_NN countries_NNS of_IN the_DT International_NNP Monetary_NNP Fund_NNP agreed_VBD to_TO the_DT ``_`` Guidelines_NNS to_TO Floating_VBG ''_'' in_IN 1974_CD ,_, such_JJ difficulties_NNS have_VBP been_VBN avoided_VBN ._.
I_PRP can_MD not_RB recall_VB any_DT disorder_NN in_IN currency_NN markets_NNS since_IN the_DT 1974_CD guidelines_NNS were_VBD adopted_VBN ._.
Thus_RB ,_, the_DT mere_JJ existence_NN of_IN a_DT market-stabilizing_JJ agency_NN helps_VBZ to_TO avoid_VB panic_NN in_IN emergencies_NNS ._.
The_DT old_JJ saying_NN advises_VBZ :_: ``_`` If_IN it_PRP ai_VBP n't_RB broke_VBD ,_, do_VBP n't_RB fix_VB it_PRP ._. ''_''
But_CC this_DT could_MD be_VB a_DT case_NN where_WRB we_PRP all_DT might_MD go_VB broke_RB if_IN it_PRP is_VBZ n't_RB fixed_VBN ._.
Mr._NNP Heller_NNP ,_, now_RB at_IN VISA_NNP International_NNP ,_, was_VBD a_DT governor_NN of_IN the_DT Federal_NNP Reserve_NNP Board_NNP from_IN 1986_CD until_IN earlier_RBR this_DT year_NN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ adapted_VBN from_IN a_DT speech_NN to_TO the_DT Commonwealth_NNP Club_NNP in_IN San_NNP Francisco_NNP ._.
Bank_NNP of_IN England_NNP Governor_NNP Robin_NNP Leigh-Pemberton_NNP urged_VBD banks_NNS to_TO be_VB cautious_JJ in_IN financing_VBG leveraged_JJ buy-outs_NNS ._.
``_`` Caution_NN should_MD ..._: be_VB the_DT rule_NN of_IN the_DT day_NN ,_, ''_'' said_VBD Mr._NNP Leigh-Pemberton_NNP in_IN a_DT speech_NN to_TO the_DT Association_NNP of_IN Corporate_NNP Treasurers_NNPS '_POS annual_JJ dinner_NN ._.

His_PRP$ remarks_NNS were_VBD distributed_VBN to_TO the_DT press_NN before_IN Chancellor_NNP of_IN the_DT Exchequer_NNP Nigel_NNP Lawson_NNP announced_VBD his_PRP$ resignation_NN last_JJ evening_NN ._.
Bank_NNP of_IN England_NNP officials_NNS said_VBD the_DT central_JJ bank_NN had_VBD no_DT comment_NN on_IN Mr._NNP Lawson_NNP 's_POS resignation_NN ._.
Mr._NNP Leigh-Pemberton_NNP reiterated_VBD that_IN the_DT exposure_NN of_IN United_NNP Kingdom_NNP banks_NNS to_TO leveraged_JJ deals_NNS have_VBP n't_RB yet_RB reached_VBN ``_`` worrying_JJ levels_NNS ._. ''_''
However_RB ,_, in_IN light_NN of_IN the_DT risks_NNS involved_VBN in_IN such_JJ transactions_NNS ,_, banks_NNS should_MD satisfy_VB themselves_PRP that_IN they_PRP have_VBP the_DT skills_NNS to_TO participate_VB in_IN this_DT market_NN and_CC clear_JJ policy_NN guidelines_NNS on_IN acceptable_JJ levels_NNS of_IN exposure_NN to_TO such_JJ transactions_NNS ,_, he_PRP said_VBD ._.
In_IN other_JJ comments_NNS ,_, he_PRP said_VBD takeovers_NNS may_MD not_RB always_RB be_VB the_DT most_RBS efficient_JJ way_NN of_IN securing_VBG a_DT change_NN of_IN corporate_JJ direction_NN or_CC strategy_NN ._.
``_`` A_DT similar_JJ result_NN could_MD sometimes_RB be_VB achieved_VBN ,_, at_IN less_JJR cost_NN ,_, by_IN changing_VBG managements_NNS ,_, ''_'' he_PRP said_VBD ._.
Intel_NNP Corp._NNP 's_POS most_RBS powerful_JJ computer_NN chip_NN has_VBZ flaws_NNS that_WDT could_MD delay_VB several_JJ computer_NN makers_NNS '_POS marketing_NN efforts_NNS ,_, but_CC the_DT ``_`` bugs_NNS ''_'' are_VBP n't_RB expected_VBN to_TO hurt_VB Intel_NNP and_CC most_JJS computer_NN makers_NNS ._.
Computer_NN experts_NNS familiar_JJ with_IN the_DT flaws_NNS ,_, found_VBN in_IN Intel_NNP 's_POS 80486_CD chip_NN ,_, say_VBP the_DT defects_NNS do_VBP n't_RB affect_VB the_DT average_JJ user_NN and_CC are_VBP likely_JJ to_TO be_VB cleared_VBN up_RP before_IN most_JJS computers_NNS using_VBG the_DT chip_NN as_IN their_PRP$ ``_`` brains_NNS ''_'' appear_VBP on_IN the_DT market_NN sometime_RB next_JJ year_NN ._.
Intel_NNP said_VBD that_DT last_JJ week_NN a_DT customer_NN discovered_VBD two_CD flaws_NNS in_IN its_PRP$ 80486_CD microprocessor_NN chip_NN 's_POS ``_`` floating-point_NN unit_NN ''_'' ,_, a_DT set_NN of_IN circuits_NNS that_WDT do_VBP certain_JJ calculations_NNS ._.
On_IN Friday_NNP ,_, Intel_NNP began_VBD notifying_VBG customers_NNS about_IN the_DT bugs_NNS which_WDT cause_VBP the_DT chip_NN to_TO give_VB wrong_JJ answers_NNS for_IN some_DT mathematical_JJ calculations_NNS ._.
But_CC while_IN International_NNP Business_NNP Machines_NNPS Corp._NNP and_CC Compaq_NNP Computer_NNP Corp._NNP say_VBP the_DT bugs_NNS will_MD delay_VB products_NNS ,_, most_JJS big_JJ computer_NN makers_NNS said_VBD the_DT flaws_NNS do_VBP n't_RB affect_VB them_PRP ._.
``_`` Bugs_NNS like_IN this_DT are_VBP just_RB a_DT normal_JJ part_NN of_IN product_NN development_NN ,_, ''_'' said_VBD Richard_NNP Archuleta_NNP ,_, director_NN of_IN Hewlett-Packard_NNP Co._NNP 's_POS advanced_JJ systems_NNS development_NN ._.
Hewlett_NNP announced_VBD last_JJ week_NN that_IN it_PRP planned_VBD to_TO ship_VB a_DT computer_NN based_VBN on_IN the_DT 486_CD chip_NN early_JJ next_JJ year_NN ._.
``_`` These_DT bugs_NNS do_VBP n't_RB affect_VB our_PRP$ schedule_NN at_IN all_DT ,_, ''_'' he_PRP said_VBD ._.
Likewise_RB ,_, AST_NNP Research_NNP Inc._NNP and_CC Sun_NNP Microsystems_NNPS Inc._NNP said_VBD the_DT bugs_NNS wo_MD n't_RB delay_VB their_PRP$ development_NN of_IN 486-based_JJ machines_NNS ._.
``_`` We_PRP have_VBP n't_RB modified_VBN our_PRP$ schedules_NNS in_IN any_DT way_NN ,_, ''_'' said_VBD a_DT Sun_NNP spokesman_NN ._.
To_TO switch_VB to_TO another_DT vendor_NN 's_POS chips_NNS ,_, ``_`` would_MD definitely_RB not_RB be_VB an_DT option_NN ,_, ''_'' he_PRP said_VBD ._.
Nonetheless_RB ,_, concern_NN about_IN the_DT chip_NN may_MD have_VB been_VBN responsible_JJ for_IN a_DT decline_NN of_IN 87.5_CD cents_NNS in_IN Intel_NNP 's_POS stock_NN to_TO $_$ 32_CD a_DT share_NN yesterday_NN in_IN over-the-counter_JJ trading_NN ,_, on_IN volume_NN of_IN 3,609,800_CD shares_NNS ,_, and_CC partly_RB responsible_JJ for_IN a_DT drop_NN in_IN Compaq_NNP 's_POS stock_NN in_IN New_NNP York_NNP Stock_NNP Exchange_NNP composite_NN trading_NN on_IN Wednesday_NNP ._.
Yesterday_NN ,_, Compaq_NNP plunged_VBD further_RBR ,_, closing_VBG at_IN $_$ 100_CD a_DT share_NN ,_, off_RB $_$ 8.625_CD a_DT share_NN ,_, on_IN volume_NN of_IN 2,633,700_CD shares_NNS ._.

The_DT Canadian_NNP Pulp_NNP and_CC Paper_NNP Association_NNP ,_, an_DT industry_NN group_NN ,_, said_VBD Canadian_JJ mills_NNS produced_VBD 532,000_CD metric_JJ tons_NNS of_IN market_NN pulp_NN in_IN September_NNP ,_, compared_VBN with_IN 527,000_CD metric_JJ tons_NNS a_DT year_NN earlier_RB ._.
Market_NN pulp_NN is_VBZ wood_NN pulp_NN sold_VBN on_IN the_DT open_JJ market_NN to_TO producers_NNS of_IN paper_NN and_CC other_JJ products_NNS ._.
The_DT statistics_NNS exclude_VBP pulp_NN consumed_VBN at_IN the_DT producing_VBG mill_NN or_CC shipped_VBN to_TO another_DT mill_NN that_WDT is_VBZ affiliated_JJ with_IN the_DT producing_VBG mill_NN ._.
Canada_NNP is_VBZ the_DT world_NN 's_POS largest_JJS producer_NN of_IN market_NN pulp_NN ._.
The_DT September_NNP 87_CD %_NN operating_NN rate_NN compared_VBN with_IN a_DT rate_NN of_IN 101_CD %_NN in_IN August_NNP but_CC was_VBD unchanged_JJ from_IN a_DT year_NN earlier_RB ._.
In_IN the_DT first_JJ nine_CD months_NNS of_IN this_DT year_NN output_NN was_VBD 5,377,000_CD metric_JJ tons_NNS ,_, down_RB from_IN 5,441,000_CD metric_JJ tons_NNS a_DT year_NN earlier_RB ._.
IMA_NNP Holdings_NNPS Corp._NNP completed_VBD its_PRP$ $_$ 3_CD billion_CD acquisition_NN of_IN American_NNP Medical_NNP International_NNP Inc._NNP ,_, purchasing_VBG 63_CD million_CD shares_NNS ,_, or_CC 86_CD %_NN ,_, of_IN the_DT Los_NNP Angeles-based_JJ health-care_NN services_NNS concern_NN for_IN $_$ 26.50_CD a_DT share_NN ._.

Treasury_NNP Secretary_NNP Nicholas_NNP Brady_NNP said_VBD that_IN Congress_NNP should_MD grant_VB the_DT Securities_NNPS and_CC Exchange_NNP Commission_NNP the_DT power_NN to_TO close_VB the_DT stock_NN markets_NNS in_IN periods_NNS of_IN crisis_NN ._.
In_IN testimony_NN to_TO the_DT Senate_NNP securities_NNS subcommittee_NN ,_, Mr._NNP Brady_NNP disputed_VBD the_DT view_NN of_IN SEC_NNP Chairman_NNP Richard_NNP Breeden_NNP ,_, who_WP told_VBD a_DT House_NNP panel_NN Wednesday_NNP that_IN he_PRP does_VBZ n't_RB want_VB the_DT ability_NN to_TO halt_VB the_DT markets_NNS ._.

But_CC Mr._NNP Brady_NNP argued_VBD that_IN the_DT SEC_NNP is_VBZ closer_JJR to_TO the_DT markets_NNS and_CC in_IN a_DT better_JJR position_NN to_TO understand_VB when_WRB the_DT exchanges_NNS are_VBP under_IN such_JJ stress_NN that_IN they_PRP should_MD be_VB closed_VBN ._.
Separately_RB ,_, Mr._NNP Brady_NNP said_VBD he_PRP asked_VBD the_DT Working_NNP Group_NNP on_IN Financial_NNP Markets_NNPS to_TO determine_VB whether_IN futures_NNS margins_NNS are_VBP too_RB low_JJ ._.
He_PRP noted_VBD that_IN some_DT minimum_NN margin_NN requirements_NNS have_VBP been_VBN reduced_VBN to_TO levels_NNS below_IN those_DT before_IN the_DT 1987_CD crash_NN ._.
``_`` This_DT raises_VBZ questions_NNS whether_IN futures_NNS and_CC equity_NN margin_NN requirements_NNS are_VBP consistent_JJ at_IN these_DT levels_NNS and_CC whether_IN futures_NNS margins_NNS are_VBP adequate_JJ ,_, ''_'' Mr._NNP Brady_NNP said_VBD ._.
Margins_NNS are_VBP the_DT amount_NN of_IN money_NN an_DT investor_NN needs_VBZ to_TO put_VB up_RB to_TO buy_VB or_CC sell_VB a_DT futures_NNS contract_NN ._.
Margins_NNS on_IN the_DT futures_NNS exchanges_NNS typically_RB are_VBP raised_VBN and_CC lowered_VBN according_VBG to_TO market_NN volatility_NN ._.
The_DT Chicago_NNP Mercantile_NNP Exchange_NNP margins_NNS for_IN the_DT Standard_NNP &_CC Poor_NNP 's_POS 500_CD stock-index_NN futures_NNS stood_VBD at_IN $_$ 10,000_CD a_DT contract_NN for_IN speculators_NNS and_CC $_$ 5,000_CD for_IN hedgers_NNS before_IN Oct._NNP 16_CD ,_, 1987_CD ;_: that_DT day_NN the_DT hedging_VBG margin_NN was_VBD raised_VBN to_TO $_$ 7,500_CD ._.
Margins_NNS were_VBD raised_VBN or_CC lowered_VBN about_IN a_DT dozen_NN times_NNS since_IN the_DT crash_NN Oct._NNP 19_CD ,_, 1987_CD ._.
Currently_RB ,_, they_PRP stand_VBP at_IN $_$ 12,000_CD for_IN speculators_NNS ,_, who_WP are_VBP typically_RB individuals_NNS and_CC non-member_NN traders_NNS ,_, and_CC $_$ 6,000_CD for_IN hedgers_NNS ,_, which_WDT are_VBP usually_RB institutions_NNS and_CC have_VBP offsetting_VBG positions_NNS in_IN the_DT underlying_VBG stocks_NNS ._.

``_`` I_PRP do_VBP not_RB have_VB a_DT view_NN of_IN whether_IN we_PRP should_MD do_VB anything_NN about_IN program_NN trading_NN at_IN this_DT time_NN ,_, ''_'' he_PRP said_VBD ._.

That_DT bill_NN ,_, proposed_VBN by_IN the_DT SEC_NNP last_JJ year_NN ,_, would_MD require_VB brokerage_NN firms_NNS to_TO disclose_VB the_DT financial_JJ positions_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ holding_VBG companies_NNS ,_, mandate_VB large_JJ traders_NNS '_POS reporting_NN of_IN program_NN or_CC block_NN trades_NNS ,_, and_CC improve_VB clearing_VBG and_CC settlement_NN of_IN trades_NNS between_IN the_DT futures_NNS and_CC stock_NN markets_NNS ._.
The_DT bill_NN also_RB would_MD give_VB the_DT SEC_NNP the_DT power_NN to_TO close_VB the_DT markets_NNS ,_, a_DT discretion_NN that_IN former_JJ SEC_NNP Chairman_NNP David_NNP Ruder_NNP wanted_VBD but_CC Mr._NNP Breeden_NNP does_VBZ n't_RB ._.
Mr._NNP Brady_NNP and_CC senators_NNS agreed_VBD to_TO have_VB their_PRP$ staffs_NNS meet_VB within_IN the_DT next_JJ week_NN to_TO start_VB fine-tuning_VB the_DT bill_NN ._.
The_DT Senate_NNP Agriculture_NNP Committee_NNP is_VBZ responding_VBG to_TO trading_NN abuses_NNS in_IN the_DT futures_NNS markets_NNS with_IN a_DT far-reaching_JJ bill_NN that_WDT would_MD become_VB the_DT Futures_NNPS Trading_NNP Practices_NNPS Act_NNP of_IN 1989_CD ._.
The_DT proposed_VBN legislation_NN has_VBZ a_DT laudable_JJ goal_NN :_: to_TO assure_VB the_DT integrity_NN of_IN the_DT U.S._NNP futures_NNS markets_NNS ._.
However_RB ,_, as_IN is_VBZ common_JJ with_IN sweeping_JJ legislation_NN ,_, the_DT proposal_NN contains_VBZ many_JJ provisions_NNS that_WDT could_MD destroy_VB important_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT system_NN it_PRP sets_VBZ out_RP to_TO preserve_VB ._.
The_DT complex_JJ bill_NN ,_, introduced_VBN by_IN Sens._NNP Patrick_NNP Leahy_NNP -LRB-_-LRB- D._NNP ,_, Vt._NNP -RRB-_-RRB- ,_, Richard_NNP Lugar_NNP -LRB-_-LRB- R._NNP ,_, Ind._NNP -RRB-_-RRB- ,_, and_CC Bob_NNP Kerrey_NNP -LRB-_-LRB- D._NNP ,_, Neb._NNP -RRB-_-RRB- ,_, covers_VBZ a_DT wide_JJ range_NN of_IN provisions_NNS that_WDT would_MD affect_VB the_DT funding_NN and_CC authority_NN of_IN the_DT Commodity_NNP Futures_NNPS Trading_NNP Commission_NNP and_CC would_MD profoundly_RB change_VB the_DT way_NN the_DT industry_NN is_VBZ regulated_VBN ._.
These_DT include_VBP provisions_NNS relating_VBG to_TO the_DT technology_NN and_CC systems_NNS that_WDT must_MD be_VB employed_VBN by_IN exchanges_NNS ,_, oversight_NN and_CC disciplinary_JJ procedures_NNS for_IN exchange_NN trading_NN practices_NNS ,_, the_DT relationship_NN between_IN commodity_NN brokerage_NN firms_NNS and_CC floor_NN traders_NNS ,_, and_CC exchange_NN governance_NN ._.
The_DT bill_NN also_RB elevates_VBZ even_RB minor_JJ rule_NN infractions_NNS to_TO felonies_NNS and_CC provides_VBZ for_IN recovery_NN of_IN punitive_JJ damages_NNS in_IN civil_JJ lawsuits_NNS and_CC arbitration_NN cases_NNS without_IN any_DT showing_NN of_IN willful_JJ misconduct_NN ._.
Many_JJ aspects_NNS of_IN the_DT bill_NN are_VBP salutary_JJ ,_, providing_VBG appropriate_JJ public_JJ safeguards_NNS that_WDT can_MD and_CC should_MD be_VB instituted_VBN throughout_IN the_DT industry_NN ._.
Indeed_RB ,_, some_DT of_IN the_DT bill_NN 's_POS requirements_NNS ,_, including_VBG broad_JJ representation_NN on_IN the_DT exchanges_NNS '_POS boards_NNS of_IN directors_NNS and_CC strong_JJ measures_NNS to_TO prevent_VB conflicts_NNS of_IN interest_NN ,_, already_RB have_VBP been_VBN put_VBN in_IN place_NN by_IN the_DT Coffee_NNP ,_, Sugar_NNP &_CC Cocoa_NNP Exchange_NNP and_CC other_JJ futures_NNS exchanges_NNS ._.
Other_JJ aspects_NNS of_IN the_DT bill_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, are_VBP either_RB structured_VBN in_IN ways_NNS that_WDT create_VBP unnecessary_JJ burdens_NNS for_IN the_DT industry_NN or_CC actually_RB are_VBP harmful_JJ to_TO the_DT exchanges_NNS ,_, the_DT industry_NN and_CC ultimately_RB the_DT general_JJ public_NN ._.
One_CD of_IN the_DT most_RBS prominent_JJ features_NNS is_VBZ the_DT requirement_NN that_IN in_IN three_CD years_NNS all_DT exchanges_NNS have_VBP in_IN place_NN a_DT system_NN that_WDT records_VBZ all_DT trades_NNS by_IN a_DT source_NN independent_JJ of_IN the_DT executing_VBG broker_NN ._.
The_DT New_NNP York_NNP futures_NNS exchanges_NNS have_VBP been_VBN working_VBG together_RB to_TO develop_VB a_DT trade_NN recording_VBG system_NN much_JJ like_IN the_DT one_NN called_VBN for_RB in_IN the_DT bill_NN ._.
We_PRP would_MD be_VB delighted_JJ to_TO have_VB such_JJ a_DT system_NN in_IN place_NN today_NN ._.
But_CC is_VBZ it_PRP realistic_JJ for_IN Congress_NNP to_TO mandate_VB by_IN a_DT rigid_JJ deadline_NN a_DT system_NN that_WDT has_VBZ not_RB yet_RB been_VBN subjected_VBN to_TO feasibility_NN studies_NNS ?_.
What_WP if_IN the_DT system_NN does_VBZ n't_RB work_VB ?_.
What_WP if_IN the_DT only_JJ system_NN that_WDT does_VBZ work_NN is_VBZ so_RB expensive_JJ that_IN ,_, at_IN best_RBS ,_, only_RB the_DT largest_JJS exchanges_NNS can_MD afford_VB it_PRP ?_.
Cost_NN is_VBZ a_DT key_JJ consideration_NN because_IN of_IN the_DT global_JJ sweep_NN of_IN the_DT financial_JJ markets_NNS ._.
The_DT U.S._NNP futures_NNS exchanges_NNS compete_VBP world-wide_RB as_RB never_RB before_RB ._.
Today_NN ,_, trading_NN in_IN almost_RB any_DT commodity_NN can_MD be_VB diverted_VBN from_IN U.S._NNP markets_NNS with_IN just_RB a_DT few_JJ strokes_NNS of_IN a_DT keyboard_NN ._.
All_DT foreign_JJ markets_NNS are_VBP aggressively_RB courting_VBG U.S._NNP business_NN ._.
In_IN fact_NN ,_, several_JJ London_NNP markets_NNS already_RB offer_VBP lower_JJR costs_NNS for_IN trading_VBG in_IN the_DT same_JJ or_CC very_RB similar_JJ contracts_NNS ._.
The_DT U.S._NNP exchanges_NNS need_VBP both_DT market_NN integrity_NN and_CC cost-efficiency_NN ;_: long-term_JJ growth_NN depends_VBZ on_IN it_PRP ._.
The_DT Senate_NNP bill_NN contains_VBZ many_JJ provisions_NNS that_WDT will_MD increase_VB the_DT costs_NNS of_IN trading_NN ._.
The_DT most_RBS arbitrary_JJ of_IN these_DT is_VBZ the_DT imposition_NN of_IN ``_`` service_NN fees_NNS ,_, ''_'' which_WDT will_MD directly_RB widen_VB the_DT cost_NN spread_NN between_IN U.S._NNP and_CC foreign_JJ markets_NNS ._.
Other_JJ provisions_NNS have_VBP a_DT more_RBR subtle_JJ ,_, but_CC nonetheless_RB real_JJ and_CC detrimental_JJ effect_NN on_IN the_DT international_JJ position_NN of_IN U.S._NNP exchanges_NNS ._.
These_DT include_VBP the_DT extension_NN of_IN liability_NN into_IN areas_NNS beyond_IN those_DT established_VBN by_IN judicial_JJ precedent_NN and_CC the_DT expansion_NN of_IN liability_NN to_TO include_VB punitive_JJ damages_NNS ._.
In_IN addition_NN to_TO increasing_VBG costs_NNS as_IN a_DT result_NN of_IN greater_JJR financial_JJ exposure_NN for_IN members_NNS ,_, these_DT measures_NNS could_MD have_VB other_JJ ,_, far-reaching_JJ repercussions_NNS ._.
One_CD section_NN of_IN the_DT bill_NN would_MD make_VB all_DT commodity_NN brokerage_NN firms_NNS and_CC floor_NN brokers_NNS liable_JJ for_IN damages_NNS without_IN willful_JJ misconduct_NN ._.
Nowhere_RB in_IN the_DT federal_JJ securities_NNS law_NN is_VBZ simple_JJ negligence_NN or_CC inadvertent_JJ action_NN a_DT source_NN of_IN liability_NN under_IN similar_JJ circumstances_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ only_RB logical_JJ to_TO assume_VB that_IN the_DT enactment_NN of_IN this_DT provision_NN will_MD lead_VB to_TO increased_VBN litigation_NN ._.
In_IN an_DT already_RB low-profitmargin_NN business_NN ,_, commodity_NN brokerage_NN firms_NNS may_MD well_RB decide_VB to_TO eliminate_VB the_DT risk_NN and_CC expense_NN of_IN dealing_VBG with_IN the_DT retail_JJ public_NN ,_, depriving_VBG the_DT private_JJ individual_NN of_IN access_NN to_TO the_DT markets_NNS ._.
Another_DT measure_NN makes_VBZ commodity_NN brokerage_NN firms_NNS liable_JJ for_IN violations_NNS committed_VBN by_IN independent_JJ floor_NN brokers_NNS who_WP execute_VBP trades_NNS for_IN them_PRP ._.
This_DT untried_JJ concept_NN would_MD expose_VB these_DT firms_NNS to_TO potentially_RB astronomical_JJ punitive_JJ damages_NNS ._.
Faced_VBN with_IN the_DT virtually_RB impossible_JJ task_NN of_IN supervising_VBG the_DT execution_NN of_IN each_DT trade_NN ,_, many_JJ commodity_NN brokerage_NN firms_NNS are_VBP likely_JJ to_TO stop_VB doing_VBG business_NN with_IN independents_NNS and_CC instead_RB hire_VB their_PRP$ own_JJ salaried_JJ floor_NN brokers_NNS ._.
This_DT would_MD force_VB out_IN of_IN business_NN many_JJ of_IN the_DT individuals_NNS and_CC small_JJ firms_NNS that_WDT function_VBP as_IN floor_NN brokers_NNS ._.
A_DT consequence_NN of_IN their_PRP$ departure_NN could_MD be_VB a_DT serious_JJ diminution_NN of_IN market_NN liquidity_NN ._.
Finally_RB ,_, under_IN the_DT bill_NN ,_, a_DT number_NN of_IN legitimate_JJ ,_, longstanding_JJ business_NN practices_NNS would_MD be_VB arbitrarily_RB banned_VBN ,_, unless_IN the_DT CFTC_NNP were_VBD to_TO take_VB specific_JJ and_CC timely_JJ action_NN to_TO permit_VB them_PRP to_TO continue_VB ._.
In_IN other_JJ words_NNS ,_, regulation_NN will_MD occur_VB through_IN inaction_NN and_CC happenstance_NN ,_, rather_RB than_IN through_IN a_DT normal_JJ deliberative_JJ procedure_NN ._.
The_DT affected_JJ practices_NNS include_VBP the_DT placing_NN of_IN oral_JJ orders_NNS ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ the_DT way_NN most_RBS public_JJ customer_NN orders_NNS are_VBP placed_VBN ,_, and_CC trading_NN between_IN affiliated_JJ brokers_NNS ,_, even_RB though_IN in_IN some_DT cases_NNS trading_VBG with_IN affiliates_NNS may_MD be_VB the_DT only_JJ way_NN to_TO obtain_VB the_DT best_JJS execution_NN for_IN a_DT client_NN ._.
Also_RB precluded_JJ would_MD be_VB dual_JJ trading_NN ,_, whereby_WRB a_DT broker_NN trades_VBZ for_IN customers_NNS as_RB well_RB as_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ account_NN ,_, a_DT practice_NN that_WDT provides_VBZ needed_JJ liquidity_NN to_TO the_DT markets_NNS ._.
All_DT U.S._NNP futures_NNS exchanges_NNS agree_VBP that_IN these_DT and_CC other_JJ trading_NN practices_NNS require_VBP proper_JJ regulation_NN and_CC supervision_NN ._.
Nonetheless_RB ,_, each_DT has_VBZ too_RB much_RB potential_JJ value_NN to_TO the_DT system_NN to_TO be_VB banned_VBN by_IN legislative_JJ fiat_NN before_IN the_DT CFTC_NNP carefully_RB considers_VBZ all_PDT the_DT consequences_NNS of_IN a_DT ban_NN and_CC what_WP the_DT regulatory_JJ alternatives_NNS are_VBP ._.
The_DT markets_NNS are_VBP complex_JJ ,_, as_IN is_VBZ the_DT environment_NN in_IN which_WDT they_PRP function_VBP ._.
When_WRB problems_NNS surface_VBP ,_, the_DT temptation_NN becomes_VBZ strong_JJ to_TO summarily_RB overhaul_VB a_DT market_NN system_NN that_WDT has_VBZ served_VBN for_IN more_JJR than_IN 100_CD years_NNS ._.
That_DT temptation_NN must_MD be_VB put_VBN aside_RB to_TO permit_VB careful_JJ consideration_NN of_IN all_PDT the_DT implications_NNS ,_, positive_JJ and_CC negative_JJ ,_, of_IN the_DT proposed_VBN resolutions_NNS to_TO those_DT problems_NNS ,_, and_CC to_TO avoid_VB creating_VBG a_DT marketplace_NN where_WRB no_DT one_CD trades_VBZ ._.
Mr._NNP Nastro_NNP is_VBZ chairman_NN of_IN the_DT Coffee_NNP ,_, Sugar_NNP &_CC Cocoa_NNP Exchange_NNP in_IN New_NNP York_NNP and_CC director_NN of_IN commodity_NN administration_NN at_IN Shearson_NNP Lehman_NNP Hutton_NNP ._.
Initial_JJ claims_NNS for_IN state_NN unemployment_NN benefits_NNS fell_VBD to_TO a_DT seasonally_RB adjusted_JJ 332,000_CD for_IN the_DT week_NN ended_VBN Oct._NNP 14_CD from_IN 396,000_CD the_DT previous_JJ week_NN ,_, the_DT Labor_NNP Department_NNP said_VBD ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN people_NNS receiving_VBG state_NN benefits_NNS in_IN the_DT week_NN ended_VBN Oct._NNP 7_CD fell_VBD to_TO a_DT seasonally_RB adjusted_JJ 2,202,000_CD ,_, or_CC 2.1_CD %_NN of_IN those_DT covered_JJ by_IN unemployment_NN insurance_NN ,_, from_IN 2,205,000_CD the_DT previous_JJ week_NN ,_, when_WRB the_DT insured_JJ unemployment_NN rate_NN was_VBD 2.2_CD %_NN ._.
Counting_VBG all_DT state_NN and_CC federal_JJ benefit_NN programs_NNS ,_, the_DT number_NN of_IN people_NNS receiving_VBG unemployment_NN benefits_NNS in_IN the_DT week_NN ended_VBN Oct._NNP 7_CD fell_VBD to_TO 1,784,400_CD from_IN 1,810,700_CD a_DT week_NN earlier_RB ._.

The_DT U.S._NNP administration_NN said_VBD its_PRP$ plan_NN would_MD allow_VB considerable_JJ flexibility_NN in_IN determining_VBG how_WRB and_CC when_WRB the_DT free-trade_JJ goals_NNS would_MD be_VB achieved_VBN ._.
The_DT U.S._NNP argues_VBZ that_IN its_PRP$ plan_NN would_MD ease_VB the_DT transition_NN to_TO freer_JJR agriculture_NN trade_NN by_IN converting_VBG certain_JJ non-tariff_JJ barriers_NNS into_IN tariffs_NNS that_WDT ,_, together_RB with_IN existing_VBG tariffs_NNS ,_, then_RB would_MD be_VB phased_VBN out_RP over_IN 10_CD years_NNS ._.

Russell_NNP Miller_NNP 's_POS ``_`` Bare-Faced_NNP Messiah_NNP :_: The_NNP True_NNP Story_NNP of_IN L._NNP Ron_NNP Hubbard_NNP ''_'' is_VBZ a_DT biography_NN of_IN the_DT founder_NN of_IN the_DT Church_NNP of_IN Scientology_NNP ._.
Mr._NNP Hubbard_NNP ,_, who_WP died_VBD in_IN 1986_CD ,_, bequeathed_VBD the_DT copyrights_NNS on_IN his_PRP$ writings_NNS to_TO his_PRP$ church_NN ,_, which_WDT licensed_VBD them_PRP to_TO New_NNP Era_NNP Publications_NNP ,_, a_DT Danish_JJ corporation_NN ._.

The_DT ``_`` Bare-Faced_NNP Messiah_NNP ''_'' decision_NN strikes_VBZ a_DT blow_NN against_IN the_DT whole_JJ historical_JJ enterprise_NN ._.

The_DT articles_NNS were_VBD largely_RB based_VBN on_IN interviews_NNS Ms._NNP Malcolm_NNP had_VBD taped_VBN with_IN Jeffrey_NNP Masson_NNP ,_, a_DT psychoanalyst_NN who_WP had_VBD served_VBN as_IN projects_NNS director_NN of_IN the_DT Freud_NNP Archives_NNPS ._.
Mr._NNP Masson_NNP then_RB brought_VBD a_DT libel_NN suit_NN against_IN Ms._NNP Malcolm_NNP ,_, the_DT New_NNP Yorker_NNP and_CC Knopf_NNP ._.
As_IN a_DT public_JJ figure_NN ,_, Mr._NNP Masson_NNP had_VBD to_TO prove_VB malice_NN and_CC ,_, as_IN proof_NN of_IN malice_NN ,_, Mr._NNP Masson_NNP contended_VBD that_IN defamatory_JJ quotations_NNS ascribed_VBN to_TO him_PRP by_IN Ms._NNP Malcolm_NNP were_VBD in_IN fact_NN fabricated_VBN ._.
The_DT quotes_NNS could_MD not_RB be_VB found_VBN on_IN the_DT tapes_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT two_CD judges_NNS who_WP decided_VBD the_DT case_NN for_IN Ms._NNP Malcolm_NNP and_CC her_PRP$ publishers_NNS conceded_VBD that_IN ,_, for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN their_PRP$ decision_NN ,_, ``_`` we_PRP assume_VBP the_DT quotations_NNS were_VBD deliberately_RB altered_VBN ._. ''_''
For_IN all_DT historians_NNS and_CC most_JJS journalists_NNS ,_, this_DT admission_NN would_MD have_VB been_VBN sufficient_JJ to_TO condemn_VB the_DT Malcolm_NNP articles_NNS ._.
But_CC Judge_NNP Arthur_NNP Alarcon_NNP ,_, joined_VBN by_IN Judge_NNP Cynthia_NNP Holcomb_NNP Hall_NNP ,_, took_VBD the_DT astonishing_JJ position_NN that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ perfectly_RB OK_JJ to_TO fabricate_VB quotations_NNS so_RB long_RB as_IN a_DT judge_NN finds_VBZ that_IN the_DT fabrications_NNS do_VBP not_RB alter_VB substantive_JJ content_NN or_CC are_VBP rational_JJ interpretations_NNS of_IN ambiguous_JJ remarks_NNS ._.
In_IN his_PRP$ eloquent_JJ dissent_NN ,_, Judge_NNP Alex_NNP Kozinski_NNP observed_VBD that_IN when_WRB a_DT writer_NN uses_VBZ quotation_NN marks_NNS in_IN reporting_VBG what_WP someone_NN has_VBZ said_VBN ,_, the_DT reader_NN assumes_VBZ that_IN these_DT are_VBP the_DT speaker_NN 's_POS precise_JJ words_NNS or_CC at_IN least_JJS his_PRP$ words_NNS purged_VBN of_IN ``_`` uh_UH ''_'' and_CC ``_`` you_PRP know_VBP ''_'' and_CC grammatical_JJ error_NN ._.

''_''
Ms._NNP Malcolm_NNP ,_, for_IN example_NN ,_, wrote_VBD that_IN Mr._NNP Masson_NNP described_VBD himself_PRP as_IN ``_`` the_DT greatest_JJS analyst_NN who_WP ever_RB lived_VBD ._. ''_''

Judge_NNP Kozinski_NNP found_VBD the_DT derivation_NN entirely_RB strained_VBN and_CC writes_VBZ that_IN ``_`` for_IN an_DT academic_JJ to_TO refer_VB to_TO himself_PRP as_IN an_DT intellectual_JJ gigolo_NN is_VBZ ..._: a_DT devastating_JJ admission_NN of_IN professional_JJ dishonesty_NN ._. ''_''

As_IN Robert_NNP Coles_NNP wrote_VBD in_IN a_DT review_NN of_IN Ms._NNP Malcolm_NNP 's_POS book_NN ,_, Mr._NNP Masson_NNP emerges_VBZ ``_`` as_IN a_DT grandiose_JJ egotist_NN ..._: and_CC ,_, in_IN the_DT end_NN ,_, a_DT self-destructive_JJ fool_NN ._.

We_PRP now_RB know_VBP that_IN the_DT words_NNS were_VBD not_RB always_RB his_PRP$ own_JJ ._.
``_`` There_EX is_VBZ one_CD sacred_JJ rule_NN of_IN journalism_NN ,_, ''_'' John_NNP Hersey_NNP has_VBZ said_VBN ._.

The_DT historical_JJ profession_NN will_MD survive_VB these_DT decisions_NNS ._.

But_CC writing_VBG history_NN is_VBZ tough_JJ enough_RB without_IN judges_NNS gratuitously_RB throwing_VBG obstacles_NNS in_IN the_DT scholar_NN 's_POS path_NN ._.
Mr._NNP Schlesinger_NNP is_VBZ Albert_NNP Schweitzer_NNP professor_NN of_IN the_DT humanities_NNS at_IN the_DT City_NNP University_NNP of_IN New_NNP York_NNP and_CC a_DT winner_NN of_IN Pulitzer_NNP Prizes_NNPS in_IN history_NN and_CC biography_NN ._.

The_DT Sept._NNP 25_CD ``_`` Tracking_NNP Travel_NNP ''_'' column_NN advises_VBZ readers_NNS to_TO ``_`` Charge_VB With_IN Caution_NN When_WRB Traveling_VBG Abroad_RB ''_'' because_IN credit-card_NN companies_NNS charge_VBP 1_CD %_NN to_TO convert_VB foreign-currency_NN expenditures_NNS into_IN dollars_NNS ._.

In_IN contrast_NN to_TO the_DT 1_CD %_NN conversion_NN fee_NN charged_VBN by_IN Visa_NNP ,_, foreign-currency_NN dealers_NNS routinely_RB charge_VBP 7_CD %_NN or_CC more_JJR to_TO convert_VB U.S._NNP dollars_NNS into_IN foreign_JJ currency_NN ._.

``_`` Lower_JJR yields_NNS are_VBP just_RB reflecting_VBG lower_JJR short-term_JJ interest_NN rates_NNS ,_, ''_'' said_VBD Brenda_NNP Malizia_NNP Negus_NNP ,_, editor_NN of_IN Money_NNP Fund_NNP Report_NNP ._.
Money_NNP funds_NNS invest_VBP in_IN such_JJ things_NNS as_IN short-term_JJ Treasury_NNP securities_NNS ,_, commercial_JJ paper_NN and_CC certificates_NNS of_IN deposit_NN ,_, all_DT of_IN which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN posting_VBG lower_JJR interest_NN rates_NNS since_IN last_JJ spring_NN ._.

The_DT average_JJ yield_NN on_IN six-month_JJ CDs_NNS of_IN $_$ 50,000_CD or_CC less_JJR at_IN major_JJ banks_NNS was_VBD 7.96_CD %_NN in_IN the_DT week_NN ended_VBD Tuesday_NNP ,_, according_VBG to_TO Banxquote_NNP Money_NNP Markets_NNPS ,_, a_DT New_NNP York_NNP information_NN service_NN ._.
One_CD way_NN that_IN money_NN fund_NN managers_NNS boost_VBP yields_NNS in_IN a_DT declining_VBG rate_NN environment_NN is_VBZ by_IN extending_VBG the_DT maturities_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ investments_NNS ,_, so_IN they_PRP can_MD earn_VB the_DT current_JJ higher_JJR rates_NNS for_IN a_DT longer_JJR period_NN ._.
The_DT average_JJ maturity_NN of_IN the_DT taxable_JJ funds_NNS that_DT Donoghue_NNP 's_POS follows_VBZ increased_VBN by_IN two_CD days_NNS in_IN the_DT latest_JJS week_NN to_TO 40_CD days_NNS ,_, its_PRP$ longest_JJS since_IN August_NNP ._.

Average_JJ maturity_NN was_VBD as_RB short_JJ as_IN 29_CD days_NNS at_IN the_DT start_NN of_IN this_DT year_NN ,_, when_WRB short-term_JJ interest_NN rates_NNS were_VBD moving_VBG steadily_RB upward_RB ._.
The_DT average_JJ seven-day_JJ compound_NN yield_NN of_IN the_DT funds_NNS reached_VBD 9.62_CD %_NN in_IN late_JJ April_NNP ._.
The_DT highest-yielding_JJ funds_NNS are_VBP still_RB above_IN 9_CD %_NN ._.
The_DT top-performing_JJ fund_NN in_IN the_DT latest_JJS week_NN was_VBD Dreyfus_NNP Worldwide_NNP Dollar_NNP ,_, with_IN a_DT seven-day_JJ compound_NN yield_NN of_IN 9.45_CD %_NN ._.
The_DT fund_NN invests_VBZ heavily_RB in_IN dollar-denominated_JJ money-market_JJ securities_NNS overseas_RB ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ currently_RB waiving_VBG management_NN fees_NNS ,_, which_WDT contributes_VBZ to_TO the_DT higher_JJR yield_NN ._.
The_DT average_JJ seven-day_JJ simple_JJ yield_NN of_IN the_DT 400_CD funds_NNS fell_VBD to_TO 8.14_CD %_NN from_IN 8.21_CD %_NN ,_, Donoghue_NNP 's_POS reported_VBD ._.
The_DT average_JJ 30-day_JJ simple_JJ yield_NN slid_VBD to_TO 8.22_CD %_NN from_IN 8.26_CD %_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT average_JJ 30-day_JJ compound_NN yield_NN fell_VBD to_TO 8.56_CD %_NN from_IN 8.60_CD %_NN ._.
Many_JJ small_JJ investors_NNS are_VBP facing_VBG a_DT double_JJ whammy_NN this_DT year_NN :_: They_PRP got_VBD hurt_VBN by_IN investing_VBG in_IN the_DT highly_RB risky_JJ junk_NN bond_NN market_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT pain_NN is_VBZ worse_JJR because_IN they_PRP did_VBD it_PRP with_IN borrowed_VBN money_NN ._.
These_DT people_NNS invested_VBD in_IN ``_`` leveraged_JJ ''_'' junk_NN bond_NN mutual_JJ funds_NNS ,_, the_DT publicly_RB traded_VBN funds_NNS that_WDT make_VBP a_DT habit_NN of_IN taking_VBG out_RP loans_NNS to_TO buy_VB extra_JJ junk_NN ._.
It_PRP 's_VBZ a_DT good_JJ strategy_NN in_IN a_DT rising_VBG market_NN ,_, where_WRB a_DT 25_CD %_NN leveraged_JJ portfolio_NN in_IN effect_NN allows_VBZ investors_NNS to_TO have_VB 125_CD %_NN of_IN their_PRP$ money_NN working_VBG for_IN them_PRP ._.
The_DT strategy_NN boosts_VBZ current_JJ yield_NN by_IN putting_VBG more_JJR bonds_NNS into_IN the_DT portfolio_NN ._.
Trouble_NN is_VBZ ,_, junk_NN bond_NN prices_NNS have_VBP been_VBN weak_JJ for_IN months_NNS ._.
Thus_RB ,_, the_DT leverage_NN has_VBZ amplified_VBN the_DT funds_NNS '_POS portfolio_NN losses_NNS ._.
And_CC shares_NNS of_IN leveraged_JJ junk_NN funds_NNS this_DT year_NN have_VBP been_VBN clobbered_VBN even_RB harder_RBR than_IN the_DT junk_NN bonds_NNS they_PRP hold_VBP ._.
``_`` That_DT 's_VBZ really_RB where_WRB the_DT leverage_NN hurt_VBD ,_, ''_'' says_VBZ Thomas_NNP Herzfeld_NNP ,_, a_DT Miami-based_JJ investment_NN manager_NN who_WP specializes_VBZ in_IN closed-end_JJ funds_NNS ._.
``_`` Share_NN prices_NNS performed_VBD even_RB worse_RBR than_IN the_DT funds_NNS '_POS asset_NN values_NNS because_IN fear_NN has_VBZ taken_VBN hold_NN ''_'' in_IN the_DT junk_NN market_NN ,_, he_PRP says_VBZ ._.
Leverage_NN is_VBZ never_RB a_DT problem_NN for_IN the_DT traditional_JJ ``_`` open_JJ end_NN ''_'' mutual_JJ funds_NNS ,_, which_WDT are_VBP n't_RB publicly_RB traded_VBN and_CC are_VBP n't_RB allowed_VBN to_TO use_VB leverage_NN at_IN all_DT ._.
Leverage_NN is_VBZ used_VBN only_RB by_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT closed-end_JJ funds_NNS ._.
The_DT usual_JJ maneuver_NN is_VBZ to_TO borrow_VB against_IN the_DT portfolio_NN value_NN or_CC issue_VB preferred_VBN stock_NN ,_, using_VBG the_DT proceeds_NNS to_TO buy_VB additional_JJ bonds_NNS ._.
The_DT fallout_NN for_IN investors_NNS lately_RB has_VBZ been_VBN painful_JJ ._.
Consider_VB the_DT New_NNP America_NNP High_NNP Income_NNP Fund_NNP ._.
With_IN a_DT leveraged_JJ position_NN of_IN about_IN 45_CD %_NN ,_, the_DT fund_NN 's_POS share_NN price_NN has_VBZ plunged_VBN 28.5_CD %_NN so_RB far_RB this_DT year_NN ._.
That_DT 's_VBZ worse_JJR than_IN the_DT price_NN drop_NN sustained_VBN by_IN the_DT bonds_NNS in_IN its_PRP$ portfolio_NN ,_, whose_WP$ total_JJ return_NN -LRB-_-LRB- bond-price_JJ changes_NNS plus_CC interest_NN -RRB-_-RRB- has_VBZ amounted_VBN to_TO a_DT negative_JJ 6.08_CD %_NN ._.
Such_JJ problems_NNS may_MD not_RB be_VB over_IN ._.
Leveraged_JJ funds_NNS in_IN particular_JJ ``_`` are_VBP still_RB extremely_RB vulnerable_JJ ,_, because_IN we_PRP 're_VBP still_RB at_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN problems_NNS in_IN the_DT junk_NN market_NN ,_, ''_'' says_VBZ George_NNP Foot_NNP ,_, a_DT managing_VBG partner_NN at_IN Newgate_NNP Management_NNP Associates_NNPS in_IN Northampton_NNP ,_, Mass_NNP ._.
Many_JJ investors_NNS are_VBP unaware_JJ their_PRP$ funds_NNS have_VBP borrowed_VBN to_TO speculate_VB in_IN such_PDT a_DT risky_JJ market_NN ._.
``_`` If_IN someone_NN actually_RB sat_VBD down_IN and_CC thought_VBD about_IN what_WP they_PRP were_VBD being_VBG sold_VBN ,_, ''_'' says_VBZ Gerald_NNP Perritt_NNP ,_, editor_NN of_IN the_DT Mutual_NNP Fund_NNP Letter_NNP in_IN Chicago_NNP ,_, they_PRP might_MD shy_VB away_RB ._.
In_IN a_DT typical_JJ leverage_NN strategy_NN ,_, a_DT fund_NN tries_VBZ to_TO capture_VB the_DT spread_NN between_IN what_WP it_PRP costs_VBZ to_TO borrow_VB and_CC the_DT higher_JJR return_NN on_IN the_DT bonds_NNS it_PRP buys_VBZ with_IN the_DT borrowed_VBN money_NN ._.
If_IN the_DT market_NN surges_VBZ ,_, holders_NNS can_MD make_VB that_IN much_RB more_JJR profit_NN ;_: the_DT leverage_NN effectively_RB acts_VBZ as_IN an_DT interest-free_JJ margin_NN account_NN for_IN investors_NNS ._.
But_CC when_WRB the_DT market_NN moves_VBZ against_IN the_DT fund_NN ,_, investors_NNS lose_VBP more_JJR than_IN other_JJ junk_NN holders_NNS because_IN the_DT market_NN decline_NN is_VBZ magnified_VBN by_IN the_DT amount_NN the_DT fund_NN is_VBZ leveraged_JJ ._.
Fund_NN managers_NNS ,_, for_IN their_PRP$ part_NN ,_, defend_VBP their_PRP$ use_NN of_IN leverage_NN ._.
Carl_NNP Ericson_NNP ,_, who_WP runs_VBZ the_DT Colonial_NNP Intermediate_NNP High_NNP Income_NNP Fund_NNP ,_, says_VBZ the_DT fund_NN 's_POS 25_CD %_NN leverage_NN has_VBZ jacked_VBN up_RP its_PRP$ interest_NN income_NN ._.
``_`` As_RB long_RB as_IN I_PRP am_VBP borrowing_VBG at_IN 9.9_CD %_NN and_CC each_DT -LCB-_-LRB- bond_NN -RCB-_-RRB- yields_VBZ over_IN that_DT ,_, it_PRP enhances_VBZ the_DT yield_NN ,_, ''_'' he_PRP maintains_VBZ ._.

During_IN the_DT latter_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT 19th_JJ century_NN ,_, Russia_NNP was_VBD on_IN a_DT gold_JJ standard_NN and_CC had_VBD gold_JJ reserves_NNS representing_VBG more_RBR than_IN 100_CD %_NN of_IN its_PRP$ outstanding_JJ currency_NN ,_, but_CC no_DT one_CD outside_NN Russia_NNP used_VBD rubles_NNS ._.
The_DT Bank_NNP of_IN England_NNP ,_, on_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, had_VBD gold_JJ reserves_NNS that_WDT averaged_VBD about_IN 30_CD %_NN of_IN its_PRP$ outstanding_JJ currency_NN ,_, and_CC Bank_NNP of_IN England_NNP notes_NNS were_VBD accepted_VBN throughout_IN the_DT world_NN ._.
The_DT most_RBS likely_JJ reason_NN for_IN this_DT disparity_NN is_VBZ that_IN the_DT Bank_NNP of_IN England_NNP was_VBD a_DT private_JJ bank_NN with_IN substantial_JJ earning_VBG assets_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT common-law_NN rights_NNS of_IN creditors_NNS to_TO collect_VB claims_NNS against_IN the_DT bank_NN were_VBD well_RB established_VBN in_IN Britain_NNP ._.
By_IN contrast_NN ,_, in_IN 19th-century_JJ Russia_NNP an_DT authoritarian_JJ government_NN owned_VBD the_DT bank_NN and_CC had_VBD the_DT power_NN to_TO revoke_VB payment_NN whenever_WRB it_PRP chose_VBD ,_, much_RB as_IN it_PRP would_MD in_IN today_NN 's_POS Soviet_NNP Union_NNP ._.
The_DT success_NN of_IN the_DT British_NNP gold_NN standard_NN was_VBD due_JJ to_TO independent_JJ private_JJ banking_NN and_CC common_JJ law_NN ,_, rather_RB than_IN the_DT choice_NN of_IN gold_NN for_IN valuing_VBG the_DT currency_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ no_DT coincidence_NN that_IN from_IN 1844_CD to_TO 1914_CD ,_, when_WRB the_DT Bank_NNP of_IN England_NNP was_VBD an_DT independent_JJ private_JJ bank_NN ,_, the_DT pound_NN was_VBD never_RB devalued_VBN and_CC payment_NN of_IN gold_NN for_IN pound_NN notes_NNS was_VBD never_RB suspended_VBN ,_, but_CC with_IN the_DT subsequent_JJ nationalization_NN of_IN the_DT Bank_NNP of_IN England_NNP ,_, the_DT pound_NN was_VBD devalued_VBN with_IN increasing_VBG frequency_NN and_CC its_PRP$ use_NN as_IN an_DT international_JJ medium_NN of_IN exchange_NN declined_VBD ._.
The_DT Soviet_NNP Union_NNP should_MD keep_VB these_DT lessons_NNS in_IN mind_NN as_IN it_PRP seeks_VBZ to_TO establish_VB the_DT ruble_NN as_IN an_DT international_JJ currency_NN ._.
One_CD way_NN to_TO make_VB the_DT ruble_NN into_IN a_DT major_JJ international_JJ currency_NN would_MD be_VB to_TO leave_VB reserves_NNS of_IN gold_NN and_CC earning_VBG assets_NNS in_IN a_DT Swiss_NNP bank_NN with_IN distributions_NNS based_VBN on_IN Swiss_NNP laws_NNS ._.

Motorola_NNP is_VBZ fighting_VBG back_RB against_IN junk_NN mail_NN ._.

Motorola_NNP is_VBZ in_IN good_JJ company_NN ._.

While_IN no_DT one_NN has_VBZ tracked_VBN how_WRB many_JJ company_NN mail_NN rooms_NNS throw_VBP out_RP junk_NN mail_NN ,_, direct-mail_JJ advertising_NN firms_NNS say_VBP the_DT number_NN is_VBZ growing_VBG ._.
General_NNP Motors_NNPS earlier_RBR this_DT year_NN said_VBD it_PRP would_MD n't_RB deliver_VB bulk_JJ mail_NN or_CC free_JJ magazines_NNS in_IN its_PRP$ Flint_NNP ,_, Mich._NNP ,_, office_NN ,_, while_IN Air_NNP Products_NNPS &_CC Chemicals_NNPS ,_, Allentown_NNP ,_, Pa._NNP ,_, says_VBZ it_PRP screens_VBZ junk_NN mail_NN and_CC often_RB throws_VBZ out_RP most_JJS of_IN a_DT given_VBN mass_NN mailing_NN ._.
Why_WRB the_DT revolt_NN ?_.

David_NNP B._NNP Hilder_NNP in_IN New_NNP York_NNP contributed_VBD to_TO this_DT article_NN ._.
Anheuser-Busch_NNP Cos._NNP said_VBD it_PRP plans_VBZ to_TO aggressively_RB discount_VB its_PRP$ major_JJ beer_NN brands_NNS ,_, setting_VBG the_DT stage_NN for_IN a_DT potentially_RB bruising_JJ price_NN war_NN as_IN the_DT maturing_VBG industry_NN 's_POS growth_NN continues_VBZ to_TO slow_VB ._.
Anheuser_NNP ,_, the_DT world_NN 's_POS largest_JJS brewer_NN and_CC U.S._NNP market_NN leader_NN ,_, has_VBZ historically_RB been_VBN reluctant_JJ to_TO engage_VB in_IN price-cutting_NN as_IN a_DT means_NN of_IN boosting_VBG sales_NNS volume_NN ._.

FEDERAL_JJ COURTS_NNS URGED_VBN to_TO cut_VB costs_NNS and_CC reduce_VB delays_NNS of_IN civil_JJ suits_NNS ._.
The_DT study_NN ,_, conducted_VBN by_IN a_DT task_NN force_NN of_IN the_DT Brookings_NNP Institution_NNP ,_, suggests_VBZ that_IN Congress_NNP should_MD require_VB the_DT courts_NNS to_TO develop_VB the_DT plans_NNS ._.

The_DT Washington_NNP ,_, D.C._NNP ,_, think_NN tank_NN recommends_VBZ that_IN the_DT courts_NNS adopt_VB different_JJ ``_`` tracks_NNS ''_'' for_IN different_JJ types_NNS of_IN civil_JJ cases_NNS in_IN order_NN to_TO separate_VB the_DT handling_NN of_IN highly_RB complex_JJ suits_NNS from_IN simpler_JJR ones_NNS ._.

Mr._NNP Lorin_NNP ,_, a_DT stock_NN promoter_NN ,_, pleaded_VBD guilty_JJ to_TO the_DT stock-manipulation_NN charges_NNS in_IN April_NNP and_CC agreed_VBD to_TO cooperate_VB with_IN the_DT government_NN 's_POS investigation_NN of_IN Mr._NNP Laff_NNP ._.
