This_DT is_VBZ in_IN response_NN to_TO Atsushi_NNP Kageyama_NNP 's_POS Manager_NNP 's_POS Journal_NNP ,_, ``_`` Looking_VBG for_IN the_DT Real_JJ Thing_NN in_IN Sony_NNP ''_'' -LRB-_-LRB- editorial_NN page_NN ,_, Oct._NNP 2_CD -RRB-_-RRB- ._.
Though_IN I_PRP agree_VBP with_IN many_JJ of_IN Mr._NNP Kageyama_NNP 's_POS comments_NNS ,_, I_PRP believe_VBP he_PRP points_VBZ the_DT gun_NN in_IN the_DT wrong_JJ direction_NN :_: It_PRP is_VBZ n't_RB the_DT Americans_NNPS who_WP must_MD be_VB criticized_VBN for_IN not_RB understanding_VBG the_DT Japanese_JJ culture_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT Japanese_NNPS who_WP insist_VBP on_IN forcing_VBG their_PRP$ culture_NN on_IN Americans_NNPS ._.
The_DT Japanese_NNPS want_VBP us_PRP to_TO accept_VB their_PRP$ culture_NN ,_, but_CC they_PRP refuse_VBP to_TO accept_VB the_DT American_JJ culture_NN ._.
Japanese_JJ managers_NNS ca_MD n't_RB expect_VB Americans_NNPS to_TO behave_VB as_IN if_IN they_PRP were_VBD Japanese_NNPS ;_: instead_RB ,_, they_PRP must_MD manage_VB Americans_NNPS as_IN Americans_NNPS ._.
Americans_NNPS are_VBP expected_VBN to_TO conform_VB to_TO the_DT Japanese_JJ culture_NN when_WRB in_IN Japan_NNP ._.
What_WP is_VBZ wrong_JJ with_IN expecting_VBG the_DT Japanese_NNPS to_TO conform_VB to_TO American_JJ norms_NNS when_WRB they_PRP locate_VBP here_RB ?_.
Americans_NNPS place_VBP native_JJ or_CC native_JJ speakers_NNS in_IN charge_NN of_IN subsidiaries_NNS overseas_RB ._.
European_JJ multinationals_NNS do_VBP likewise_RB ;_: even_RB in_IN America_NNP ,_, their_PRP$ affiliates_NNS are_VBP usually_RB run_VBN by_IN American_JJ managers_NNS ._.
But_CC the_DT Japanese_NNPS insist_VBP upon_IN Japanese_JJ managers_NNS everywhere_RB they_PRP set_VBP up_RP shop_NN ._.
Do_VBP the_DT Japanese_NNP feel_VB so_RB superior_JJ that_IN they_PRP can_MD not_RB find_VB capable_JJ American_JJ managers_NNS ?_.
Paul_NNP A._NN Herbig_NNP Indiana_NNP University_NNP Bloomington_NNP ,_, Ind_NNP ._.

Few_JJ people_NNS are_VBP aware_JJ that_IN the_DT federal_JJ government_NN lends_VBZ almost_RB as_IN much_JJ money_NN as_IN it_PRP borrows_VBZ ._.
From_IN 1980_CD to_TO 1988_CD ,_, while_IN federal_JJ budget_NN deficits_NNS totaled_VBD $_$ 1.41_CD trillion_CD ,_, the_DT government_NN issued_VBD $_$ 394_CD billion_CD of_IN new_JJ direct_JJ loans_NNS and_CC an_DT additional_JJ $_$ 756_CD billion_CD of_IN new_JJ primary_JJ loan_NN guarantees_NNS ._.
These_DT figures_NNS omit_VBP secondary_JJ guarantees_NNS ,_, deposit_NN insurance_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT activities_NNS of_IN Government-Sponsored_NNP Enterprises_NNP -LRB-_-LRB- a_DT huge_JJ concern_NN in_IN its_PRP$ own_JJ right_NN ,_, as_IN detailed_VBN on_IN this_DT page_NN May_NNP 3_CD -RRB-_-RRB- ._.
Federal_JJ credit_NN programs_NNS date_VBP back_RB to_TO the_DT New_NNP Deal_NNP ,_, and_CC were_VBD meant_VBN to_TO break_VB even_RB financially_RB ._.
Since_IN the_DT 1950s_CD ,_, federal_JJ lending_NN has_VBZ experienced_VBN extraordinary_JJ growth_NN in_IN credit_NN volume_NN ,_, subsidy_NN rates_NNS ,_, and_CC policy_NN applications_NNS ,_, spurred_VBN on_RP by_IN the_DT growth_NN of_IN government_NN in_IN general_JJ and_CC budget_NN gimmicks_NNS and_CC deceptive_JJ management_NN in_IN particular_NN ._.
As_IN we_PRP will_MD see_VB ,_, many_JJ of_IN these_DT obligations_NNS do_VBP n't_RB show_VB up_RP as_IN part_NN of_IN the_DT federal_JJ deficit_NN ._.
But_CC recent_JJ events_NNS indicate_VBP that_DT federal_JJ credit_NN is_VBZ out_IN of_IN control_NN ._.

Farmers_NNP Home_NNP Administration_NNP -LRB-_-LRB- FmHA_NNP -RRB-_-RRB- loans_NNS have_VBP turned_VBN into_IN de_FW facto_FW giveaway_JJ programs_NNS ;_: losses_NNS over_IN the_DT next_JJ three_CD years_NNS are_VBP expected_VBN to_TO exceed_VB $_$ 20_CD billion_CD ._.
Defaults_NNS on_IN Veterans_NNP Affairs_NNP loan_NN guarantees_NNS have_VBP quadrupled_VBN in_IN the_DT past_JJ eight_CD years_NNS ._.
Last_JJ month_NN ,_, the_DT General_NNP Accounting_NNP Office_NNP reported_VBD that_IN defaults_NNS in_IN Federal_NNP Housing_NNP Administration_NNP guarantees_NNS were_VBD five_CD times_NNS as_RB high_JJ as_IN previously_RB estimated_VBN ,_, and_CC that_IN FHA_NNP 's_POS equity_NN fell_VBD to_TO minus_IN $_$ 2.9_CD billion_CD ._.
GAO_NNP 's_POS findings_NNS are_VBP particularly_RB troubling_JJ because_IN the_DT FHA_NNP has_VBZ about_RB $_$ 300_CD billion_CD in_IN obligations_NNS outstanding_JJ and_CC had_VBD previously_RB been_VBN considered_VBN one_CD of_IN the_DT most_RBS financially_RB secure_VB credit_NN programs_NNS ._.
Scores_NNS of_IN other_JJ credit_NN programs_NNS ,_, subsidizing_VBG agriculture_NN ,_, small_JJ business_NN ,_, exporters_NNS ,_, defense_NN ,_, energy_NN ,_, transportation_NN and_CC others_NNS ,_, are_VBP less_RBR visible_JJ but_CC in_IN no_DT better_JJR shape_NN ._.
If_IN the_DT programs_NNS continue_VBP their_PRP$ present_JJ path_NN ,_, the_DT potential_JJ government_NN losses_NNS are_VBP staggering_JJ :_: The_DT federal_JJ government_NN holds_VBZ $_$ 222_CD billion_CD in_IN direct_JJ loans_NNS outstanding_JJ and_CC backs_VBZ an_DT additional_JJ $_$ 550_CD billion_CD in_IN primary_JJ guarantees_NNS ._.
-LRB-_-LRB- Secondary_JJ guarantees_NNS of_IN pools_NNS of_IN FHA_NNP -_: and_CC VA-backed_JJ loans_NNS by_IN the_DT agency_NN known_VBN as_IN Ginnie_NNP Mae_NNP currently_RB exceed_VBP $_$ 330_CD billion_CD ._. -RRB-_-RRB-
Although_IN external_JJ events_NNS have_VBP contributed_VBN to_TO the_DT morass_NN ,_, the_DT principal_JJ causes_NNS of_IN the_DT current_JJ crisis_NN are_VBP internal_JJ and_CC generic_JJ to_TO all_DT programs_NNS ._.
To_TO reduce_VB the_DT risks_NNS while_IN still_RB retaining_VBG the_DT legitimate_JJ benefits_NNS these_DT programs_NNS can_MD provide_VB ,_, credit_NN policy_NN must_MD :_: 1_LS ._. Use_VB credit_NN to_TO improve_VB the_DT operation_NN of_IN capital_NN markets_NNS ,_, not_RB to_TO provide_VB subsidies_NNS ._.
There_EX is_VBZ a_DT fundamental_JJ conflict_NN between_IN providing_VBG a_DT subsidy_NN and_CC maintaining_VBG the_DT integrity_NN of_IN a_DT credit_NN program_NN ._.
If_IN the_DT program_NN is_VBZ meant_VBN to_TO provide_VB a_DT subsidy_NN ,_, collecting_VBG the_DT debt_NN defeats_VBZ the_DT original_JJ goal_NN ._.
Thus_RB ,_, subsidized_JJ loans_NNS tend_VBP to_TO turn_VB into_IN giveaway_JJ programs_NNS ,_, with_IN increasing_VBG subsidy_NN and_CC default_NN rates_NNS over_IN time_NN ._.
To_TO avoid_VB this_DT problem_NN ,_, government_NN should_MD issue_VB credit_NN only_RB if_IN it_PRP intends_VBZ to_TO use_VB every_DT legal_JJ method_NN to_TO collect_VB ._.
In_IN contrast_NN ,_, credit_NN programs_NNS can_MD be_VB appropriate_JJ tools_NNS to_TO improve_VB the_DT operation_NN of_IN capital_NN markets_NNS ._.
For_IN example_NN ,_, legal_JJ restrictions_NNS on_IN interstate_JJ banking_NN once_RB inhibited_VBD the_DT supply_NN of_IN credit_NN to_TO the_DT agricultural_JJ sector_NN ._.
Farm_NN lending_NN was_VBD enacted_VBN to_TO correct_VB this_DT problem_NN by_IN providing_VBG a_DT reliable_JJ flow_NN of_IN lendable_JJ funds_NNS ._.
However_RB ,_, this_DT in_IN no_DT way_NN justifies_VBZ the_DT huge_JJ government_NN subsidies_NNS and_CC losses_NNS on_IN such_JJ loans_NNS ._.
Credit_NN policy_NN should_MD separate_VB these_DT two_CD competing_VBG objectives_NNS and_CC eliminate_VB aspects_NNS that_WDT provide_VBP the_DT subsidy_NN ._.
For_IN example_NN ,_, student_NN loans_NNS currently_RB attempt_VBP to_TO subsidize_VB college_NN attendance_NN and_CC mitigate_VB problems_NNS created_VBN by_IN the_DT fact_NN that_IN students_NNS '_POS future_JJ earnings_NNS are_VBP not_RB accepted_VBN as_IN collateral_NN ._.
The_DT program_NN provides_VBZ highly_RB subsidized_JJ loans_NNS to_TO any_DT student_NN whose_WP$ family_NN earns_VBZ less_JJR than_IN a_DT particular_JJ amount_NN ._.
High_JJ default_NN rates_NNS ,_, a_DT low_JJ interest_NN rate_NN ,_, and_CC government_NN coverage_NN of_IN all_DT interest_NN costs_NNS while_IN the_DT student_NN is_VBZ in_IN school_NN make_VBP program_NN costs_NNS extremely_RB high_JJ ._.
Families_NNS that_WDT do_VBP not_RB need_VB the_DT loan_NN can_MD make_VB money_NN simply_RB by_IN putting_VBG the_DT loan_NN in_IN the_DT bank_NN and_CC paying_VBG it_PRP back_RP when_WRB the_DT student_NN graduates_VBZ ._.
In_IN contrast_NN ,_, a_DT student_NN loan_NN program_NN that_WDT was_VBD meant_VBN solely_RB to_TO correct_VB capital-market_JJ imperfections_NNS would_MD allow_VB loans_NNS for_IN any_DT student_NN ,_, regardless_RB of_IN family_NN income_NN ,_, at_IN market_NN or_CC near-market_JJ rates_NNS ._.
While_IN the_DT student_NN was_VBD in_IN school_NN ,_, interest_NN costs_NNS would_MD either_RB be_VB paid_VBN by_IN the_DT student_NN or_CC added_VBN to_TO the_DT loan_NN balance_NN ._.
This_DT program_NN ,_, combined_VBN with_IN cash_NN grants_NNS to_TO needy_JJ students_NNS ,_, would_MD reduce_VB program_NN costs_NNS and_CC much_RB more_RBR effectively_RB target_VB the_DT intended_JJ beneficiaries_NNS ._.
2_LS ._. Provide_VB better_JJR incentives_NNS ._.
Given_VBN the_DT structure_NN of_IN most_JJS credit_NN programs_NNS ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ surprising_JJ that_IN default_NN rates_NNS are_VBP not_RB even_RB higher_JJR ._.
Guarantee_NN rates_NNS are_VBP typically_RB 100_CD %_NN ,_, giving_VBG lenders_NNS little_JJ reason_NN to_TO screen_NN customers_NNS carefully_RB ._.
Reducing_VBG those_DT rates_NNS moderately_RB -LRB-_-LRB- say_UH ,_, to_TO 75_CD %_NN -RRB-_-RRB- would_MD still_RB provide_VB substantial_JJ assistance_NN to_TO borrowers_NNS ._.
But_CC it_PRP would_MD also_RB encourage_VB lenders_NNS to_TO choose_VB more_RBR creditworthy_NN customers_NNS ,_, and_CC go_VB a_DT long_JJ way_NN toward_IN reducing_VBG defaults_NNS ._.
For_IN example_NN ,_, the_DT Small_NNP Business_NNP Administration_NNP has_VBZ had_VBD reasonable_JJ success_NN in_IN reducing_VBG both_DT guarantee_NN rates_NNS and_CC default_NN rates_NNS in_IN its_PRP$ Preferred_NNP Lenders_NNP '_POS Program_NNP ._.
Borrowers_NNS '_POS incentives_NNS are_VBP equally_RB skewed_JJ ._.
Since_IN the_DT government_NN has_VBZ a_DT dismal_JJ record_NN of_IN collecting_VBG bad_JJ debts_NNS ,_, the_DT costs_NNS to_TO the_DT borrower_NN of_IN defaulting_VBG are_VBP usually_RB low_JJ ._.
In_IN addition_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ often_RB possible_JJ to_TO obtain_VB a_DT new_JJ government_NN loan_NN even_RB if_IN existing_JJ debts_NNS are_VBP not_RB paid_VBN off_RP ._.
Simple_NN policy_NN prescriptions_NNS in_IN this_DT case_NN would_MD be_VB to_TO improve_VB debt_NN collection_NN -LRB-_-LRB- taking_VBG the_DT gloves_NNS off_RP contracted_VBN collection_NN agencies_NNS -RRB-_-RRB- and_CC to_TO deny_VB new_JJ credit_NN to_TO defaulters_NNS ._.
These_DT provisions_NNS would_MD be_VB difficult_JJ to_TO enforce_VB for_IN a_DT program_NN intended_VBN to_TO provide_VB a_DT subsidy_NN ,_, but_CC would_MD be_VB reasonable_JJ and_CC effective_JJ devices_NNS for_IN programs_NNS that_WDT attempt_VBP to_TO offset_VB market_NN imperfections_NNS ._.
3_LS ._. Record_VB the_DT true_JJ costs_NNS of_IN credit_NN programs_NNS in_IN the_DT federal_JJ budget_NN ._.
Since_IN the_DT budget_NN measures_VBZ cash_NN flow_NN ,_, a_DT new_JJ $_$ 1_CD direct_JJ loan_NN is_VBZ treated_VBN as_IN a_DT $_$ 1_CD expenditure_NN ,_, even_RB though_IN at_IN least_JJS part_NN of_IN the_DT loan_NN will_MD be_VB paid_VBN back_RP ._.
Loan_NN guarantees_NNS do_VBP n't_RB appear_VB at_IN all_DT until_IN the_DT borrower_NN defaults_NNS ,_, so_RB new_JJ guarantees_NNS do_VBP not_RB raise_VB the_DT deficit_NN ,_, even_RB though_IN they_PRP create_VBP future_JJ liabilities_NNS for_IN the_DT government_NN ._.
By_IN converting_VBG an_DT expenditure_NN or_CC loan_NN to_TO a_DT guarantee_NN ,_, the_DT government_NN can_MD ensure_VB the_DT same_JJ flow_NN of_IN resources_NNS and_CC reduce_VB the_DT current_JJ deficit_NN ._.
Predictably_RB ,_, guarantees_NNS outstanding_JJ have_VBP risen_VBN by_IN $_$ 130_CD billion_CD since_IN 1985_CD ,_, while_IN direct_JJ loans_NNS outstanding_JJ have_VBP fallen_VBN by_IN $_$ 30_CD billion_CD ._.
The_DT true_JJ budgetary_JJ cost_NN of_IN a_DT credit_NN subsidy_NN is_VBZ the_DT discounted_JJ value_NN of_IN the_DT net_JJ costs_NNS to_TO government_NN ._.
This_DT figure_NN could_MD be_VB estimated_VBN using_VBG techniques_NNS employed_VBN by_IN private_JJ lenders_NNS to_TO forecast_VB losses_NNS ,_, or_CC determined_VBN by_IN selling_VBG loans_NNS to_TO private_JJ owners_NNS -LRB-_-LRB- without_IN federal_JJ guarantees_NNS -RRB-_-RRB- ._.
Neither_DT technique_NN is_VBZ perfect_JJ ,_, but_CC both_DT are_VBP better_JJR than_IN the_DT current_JJ system_NN ,_, which_WDT misstates_VBZ the_DT costs_NNS of_IN new_JJ credit_NN programs_NNS by_IN amounts_NNS that_WDT vary_VBP substantially_RB and_CC average_VBP about_RB $_$ 20_CD billion_CD annually_RB ,_, according_VBG to_TO the_DT Congressional_NNP Budget_NNP Office_NNP ._.
A_DT budget_NN that_WDT reflected_VBD the_DT real_JJ costs_NNS of_IN lending_NN would_MD eliminate_VB incentives_NNS to_TO convert_VB spending_NN or_CC lending_NN programs_NNS to_TO guarantees_NNS and_CC would_MD let_VB taxpayers_NNS know_VB what_WP Congress_NNP is_VBZ committing_VBG them_PRP to_TO ._.
4_LS ._. Impose_VB standard_JJ accounting_NN and_CC administrative_JJ practices_NNS ._.
Creative_JJ accounting_NN is_VBZ a_DT hallmark_NN of_IN federal_JJ credit_NN ._.
Many_JJ agencies_NNS roll_VBP over_RP their_PRP$ debt_NN ,_, paying_VBG off_RP delinquent_JJ loans_NNS by_IN issuing_VBG new_JJ loans_NNS ,_, or_CC converting_VBG defaulted_JJ loan_NN guarantees_NNS into_IN direct_JJ loans_NNS ._.
In_IN any_DT case_NN ,_, they_PRP avoid_VBP having_VBG to_TO write_VB off_RP the_DT loans_NNS ._.
Some_DT agencies_NNS simply_RB keep_VB bad_JJ loans_NNS on_IN the_DT books_NNS ;_: as_RB late_RB as_IN 1987_CD ,_, the_DT Export-Import_NNP Bank_NNP held_VBD in_IN its_PRP$ portfolio_NN at_IN face_NN value_NN loans_NNS made_VBN to_TO Cuba_NNP in_IN the_DT 1950s_CD ._.
More_RBR seriously_RB ,_, FmHA_NNP has_VBZ carried_VBN several_JJ billion_CD dollars_NNS of_IN defaulted_JJ loans_NNS at_IN face_NN value_NN ._.
Until_IN GAO_NNP 's_POS recent_JJ audit_NN ,_, FHA_NNP books_NNS had_VBD not_RB been_VBN subject_JJ to_TO a_DT complete_JJ external_JJ audit_NN in_IN 15_CD years_NNS ._.
The_DT administration_NN of_IN federal_JJ credit_NN should_MD closely_RB parallel_VB private_JJ lending_JJ practices_NNS ,_, including_VBG the_DT development_NN of_IN a_DT loan_NN loss_NN reserve_NN and_CC regular_JJ outside_JJ audits_NN ._.
Establishing_VBG these_DT practices_NNS would_MD permit_VB earlier_JJR identification_NN of_IN emerging_VBG financial_JJ crises_NNS ,_, provide_VB better_JJR information_NN for_IN loan_NN sales_NNS and_CC budgeting_NN decisions_NNS ,_, and_CC reduce_VB fraud_NN ._.
Government_NNP lending_NN was_VBD not_RB intended_VBN to_TO be_VB a_DT way_NN to_TO obfuscate_VB spending_NN figures_NNS ,_, hide_VB fraudulent_JJ activity_NN ,_, or_CC provide_VB large_JJ subsidies_NNS ._.
The_DT reforms_NNS described_VBN above_RB would_MD provide_VB a_DT more_RBR limited_JJ ,_, but_CC clearer_JJR ,_, safer_JJR and_CC ultimately_RB more_RBR useful_JJ role_NN for_IN government_NN as_IN a_DT lender_NN ._.
Without_IN such_JJ reforms_NNS ,_, credit_NN programs_NNS will_MD continue_VB to_TO be_VB a_DT large-scale_JJ ,_, high-risk_JJ proposition_NN for_IN taxpayers_NNS ._.

The_DT U.S._NNP is_VBZ submitting_VBG the_DT proposal_NN today_NN in_IN Geneva_NNP ,_, hoping_VBG that_IN the_DT initiative_NN will_MD spur_VB members_NNS of_IN the_DT General_NNP Agreement_NNP on_IN Tariffs_NNP and_CC Trade_NNP to_TO reach_VB agreement_NN on_IN new_JJ trade_NN rules_NNS before_IN their_PRP$ current_JJ negotiating_NN round_NN concludes_VBZ in_IN December_NNP 1990_CD ._.
Another_DT U.S._NNP proposal_NN filed_VBN Monday_NNP urges_VBZ more_JJR ``_`` fair_JJ play_NN ''_'' in_IN services_NNS trade_NN ,_, including_VBG predictable_JJ and_CC clear_JJ rules_NNS and_CC equality_NN in_IN the_DT treatment_NN of_IN foreign_JJ and_CC domestic_JJ service_NN companies_NNS ._.
Unlike_IN the_DT earlier_JJR U.S._NNP farm-trade_JJ proposal_NN which_WDT struck_VBD European_JJ countries_NNS as_RB too_RB extreme_JJ ,_, the_DT latest_JJS plan_NN would_MD provide_VB some_DT room_NN for_IN maneuver_NN ._.
For_IN instance_NN ,_, the_DT new_JJ U.S._NNP package_NN makes_VBZ clear_JJ there_EX would_MD be_VB a_DT transition_NN period_NN during_IN which_WDT GATT_NNP members_NNS could_MD use_VB a_DT combination_NN of_IN tariffs_NNS and_CC quotas_NNS to_TO cushion_VB their_PRP$ farmers_NNS from_IN foreign_JJ competition_NN ._.
It_PRP also_RB says_VBZ countries_NNS could_MD temporarily_RB raise_VB tariffs_NNS on_IN certain_JJ products_NNS if_IN they_PRP experience_VBP an_DT unusually_RB heavy_JJ volume_NN of_IN imports_NNS ._.
Instead_RB of_IN proposing_VBG a_DT complete_JJ elimination_NN of_IN farm_NN subsidies_NNS ,_, as_IN the_DT earlier_JJR U.S._NNP proposal_NN did_VBD ,_, the_DT new_JJ package_NN calls_VBZ for_IN the_DT elimination_NN of_IN only_RB the_DT most_JJS tradedistorting_JJ ones_NNS ._.
Less_RBR objectionable_JJ ones_NNS would_MD be_VB subject_JJ only_RB to_TO some_DT restraints_NNS ,_, and_CC others_NNS with_IN a_DT ``_`` relatively_RB minor_JJ trade_NN impact_NN ''_'' would_MD be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO continue_VB under_IN certain_JJ conditions_NNS ._.
The_DT new_JJ U.S._NNP plan_NN also_RB would_MD establish_VB procedures_NNS to_TO prevent_VB countries_NNS from_IN using_VBG health_NN and_CC sanitation_NN rules_NNS to_TO impede_VB trade_NN arbitrarily_RB ._.
The_DT goal_NN would_MD be_VB to_TO resolve_VB disputes_NNS such_JJ as_IN one_CD prompted_VBN by_IN the_DT European_NNP Community_NNP 's_POS current_JJ attempt_NN to_TO bar_NN imports_NNS of_IN beef_NN from_IN hormone-treated_JJ U.S._NNP cattle_NNS ._.

To_TO encourage_VB more_JJR competition_NN among_IN exporting_VBG countries_NNS ,_, the_DT U.S._NNP is_VBZ proposing_VBG that_IN export_NN subsidies_NNS ,_, including_VBG tax_NN incentives_NNS for_IN exporters_NNS ,_, be_VB phased_VBN out_RP in_IN five_CD years_NNS ._.

``_`` If_IN he_PRP does_VBZ to_TO the_DT domestic_JJ operations_NNS what_WP he_PRP did_VBD internationally_RB ,_, ''_'' says_VBZ Mr._NNP Zurkuhlen_NNP ,_, ``_`` this_DT company_NN will_MD earn_VB $_$ 6_CD or_CC $_$ 7_CD a_DT share_NN in_IN a_DT few_JJ years_NNS ._.
The_DT Voting_NNP Rights_NNP Act_NNP of_IN 1965_CD was_VBD enacted_VBN to_TO keep_VB the_DT promise_NN of_IN the_DT Fifteenth_NNP Amendment_NNP and_CC enable_VB Southern_JJ blacks_NNS to_TO go_VB to_TO the_DT polls_NNS ,_, unhindered_JJ by_IN literacy_NN tests_NNS and_CC other_JJ exclusionary_JJ devices_NNS ._.
Twenty-five_CD years_NNS later_RB ,_, the_DT Voting_NNP Rights_NNP Act_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN transformed_VBN by_IN the_DT courts_NNS and_CC the_DT Justice_NNP Department_NNP into_IN a_DT program_NN of_IN racial_JJ gerrymandering_NN designed_VBN to_TO increase_VB the_DT number_NN of_IN blacks_NNS and_CC other_JJ minorities_NNS --_: Hispanics_NNPS ,_, Asians_NNPS and_CC native_JJ Americans_NNPS --_: holding_VBG elective_JJ office_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT 1980s_CD ,_, the_DT Justice_NNP Department_NNP and_CC lower_JJR federal_JJ courts_NNS that_WDT enforce_VBP the_DT Voting_NNP Rights_NNP Act_NNP have_VBP required_VBN state_NN legislatures_NNS and_CC municipal_JJ governments_NNS to_TO create_VB the_DT maximum_JJ number_NN of_IN ``_`` safe_JJ ''_'' minority_NN election_NN districts_NNS --_: districts_NNS where_WRB minorities_NNS form_VBP between_IN 65_CD %_NN and_CC 80_CD %_NN of_IN the_DT voting_VBG population_NN ._.
The_DT program_NN has_VBZ even_RB been_VBN called_VBN upon_RP to_TO create_VB ``_`` safe_JJ ''_'' white_JJ electoral_JJ districts_NNS in_IN municipalities_NNS where_WRB whites_NNS are_VBP the_DT minority_NN ._.
Although_IN Section_NNP 2_CD of_IN the_DT act_NN expressly_RB disclaims_VBZ requiring_VBG that_IN minorities_NNS win_VB a_DT proportional_JJ share_NN of_IN elective_JJ offices_NNS ,_, few_JJ municipal_NN and_CC state_NN government_NN plans_NNS achieve_VBP preclearance_NN by_IN the_DT Justice_NNP Department_NNP or_CC survive_VBP the_DT scrutiny_NN of_IN the_DT lower_JJR federal_JJ courts_NNS unless_IN they_PRP carve_VBP out_RP as_RB many_JJ solidly_RB minority_NN districts_NNS as_IN possible_JJ ._.
The_DT new_JJ goal_NN of_IN the_DT Voting_NNP Rights_NNP Act_NNP --_: more_JJR minorities_NNS in_IN political_JJ office_NN --_: is_VBZ laudable_JJ ._.
For_IN the_DT political_JJ process_NN to_TO work_VB ,_, all_DT citizens_NNS ,_, regardless_RB of_IN race_NN ,_, must_MD feel_VB represented_VBN ._.
One_CD essential_JJ indicator_NN that_IN they_PRP are_VBP is_VBZ that_IN members_NNS of_IN minority_NN groups_NNS get_VBP elected_VBN to_TO public_JJ office_NN with_IN reasonable_JJ frequency_NN ._.
As_IN is_VBZ ,_, blacks_NNS constitute_VBP 12_CD %_NN of_IN the_DT population_NN ,_, but_CC fewer_JJR than_IN 2_CD %_NN of_IN elected_JJ leaders_NNS ._.
But_CC racial_JJ gerrymandering_NN is_VBZ not_RB the_DT best_JJS way_NN to_TO accomplish_VB that_DT essential_JJ goal_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ a_DT quick_JJ fix_NN for_IN a_DT complex_JJ problem_NN ._.
Far_RB from_IN promoting_VBG a_DT commonality_NN of_IN interests_NNS among_IN black_JJ ,_, white_JJ ,_, Hispanic_JJ and_CC other_JJ minority_NN voters_NNS ,_, drawing_VBG the_DT district_NN lines_NNS according_VBG to_TO race_NN suggests_VBZ that_DT race_NN is_VBZ the_DT voter_NN 's_POS and_CC the_DT candidate_NN 's_VBZ most_RBS important_JJ trait_NN ._.
Such_PDT a_DT policy_NN implies_VBZ that_IN only_RB a_DT black_JJ politician_NN can_MD speak_VB for_IN a_DT black_JJ person_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN only_RB a_DT white_JJ politician_NN can_MD govern_VB on_IN behalf_NN of_IN a_DT white_JJ one_CD ._.
Examples_NNS of_IN the_DT divisive_JJ effects_NNS of_IN racial_JJ gerrymandering_NN can_MD be_VB seen_VBN in_IN two_CD cities_NNS --_: New_NNP York_NNP and_CC Birmingham_NNP ,_, Ala_NNP ._.
When_WRB they_PRP reapportion_VBP their_PRP$ districts_NNS after_IN the_DT 1990_CD census_NN ,_, every_DT other_JJ municipality_NN and_CC state_NN in_IN the_DT country_NN will_MD face_VB this_DT issue_NN ._.
New_NNP York_NNP City_NNP :_:
Racial_JJ gerrymandering_NN has_VBZ been_VBN a_DT familiar_JJ policy_NN in_IN New_NNP York_NNP City_NNP since_IN 1970_CD ,_, when_WRB Congress_NNP first_RB amended_VBD the_DT Voting_NNP Rights_NNP Act_NNP to_TO expand_VB its_PRP$ reach_NN beyond_IN the_DT Southern_JJ states_NNS ._.
In_IN 1972_CD ,_, the_DT Justice_NNP Department_NNP required_VBD that_IN the_DT electoral_JJ map_NN in_IN the_DT borough_NN of_IN Brooklyn_NNP be_VB redrawn_JJ to_TO concentrate_VB black_JJ and_CC Hispanic_JJ votes_NNS ,_, despite_IN protests_NNS that_IN the_DT new_JJ electoral_JJ boundaries_NNS would_MD split_VB a_DT neighborhood_NN of_IN Hasidic_JJ Jews_NNPS into_IN two_CD different_JJ districts_NNS ._.
This_DT year_NN ,_, a_DT commission_NN appointed_VBN by_IN the_DT mayor_NN to_TO revise_VB New_NNP York_NNP 's_POS system_NN of_IN government_NN completed_VBD a_DT new_JJ charter_NN ,_, expanding_VBG the_DT City_NNP Council_NNP to_TO 51_CD from_IN 35_CD members_NNS ._.
Sometime_RB in_IN 1991_CD ,_, as_RB soon_RB as_IN the_DT 1990_CD census_NN becomes_VBZ available_JJ ,_, a_DT redistricting_NN panel_NN will_MD redraw_VB the_DT City_NNP Council_NNP district_NN lines_NNS ._.
The_DT Charter_NNP Revision_NNP Commission_NNP has_VBZ made_VBN it_PRP clear_JJ that_IN in_IN response_NN to_TO the_DT expectations_NNS of_IN the_DT Justice_NNP Department_NNP and_CC the_DT commission_NN 's_POS own_JJ commitment_NN to_TO enhancing_VBG minority_NN political_JJ leadership_NN ,_, the_DT new_JJ district_NN lines_NNS will_MD be_VB drawn_VBN to_TO maximize_VB the_DT number_NN of_IN solidly_RB minority_NN districts_NNS ._.
Blacks_NNPS and_CC Hispanics_NNPS currently_RB make_VBP up_RP 38_CD %_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN 's_POS population_NN and_CC hold_VBP only_RB 25_CD %_NN of_IN the_DT seats_NNS on_IN the_DT council_NN ._.
Several_JJ of_IN the_DT city_NN 's_POS black_JJ leaders_NNS ,_, including_VBG Democratic_JJ mayoral_JJ nominee_NN David_NNP Dinkins_NNP ,_, have_VBP spoken_VBN out_RP for_IN racial_JJ gerrymandering_NN to_TO accord_VB blacks_NNS and_CC Hispanics_NNPS ``_`` the_DT fullest_JJS opportunity_NN for_IN representation_NN ._. ''_''
In_IN this_DT connection_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ important_JJ to_TO note_VB that_IN several_JJ members_NNS of_IN New_NNP York_NNP 's_POS sitting_VBG City_NNP Council_NNP represent_VBP heterogeneous_JJ districts_NNS that_WDT bring_VBP together_RB sizable_JJ black_JJ ,_, Hispanic_JJ ,_, and_CC non-Hispanic_JJ white_JJ populations_NNS --_: Carolyn_NNP Maloney_NNP 's_POS 8th_JJ district_NN in_IN northern_JJ Manhattan_NNP and_CC the_DT south_JJ Bronx_NNP and_CC Susan_NNP Alter_NNP 's_POS 25th_JJ district_NN in_IN Brooklyn_NNP ,_, for_IN example_NN ._.
To_TO win_VB their_PRP$ seats_NNS on_IN the_DT council_NN ,_, these_DT political_JJ leaders_NNS have_VBP had_VBD to_TO listen_VB to_TO all_PDT the_DT voices_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ district_NN and_CC devise_VB public_JJ policies_NNS that_WDT would_MD benefit_VB all_DT ._.
Often_RB they_PRP have_VBP found_VBN that_IN the_DT relevant_JJ issue_NN is_VBZ not_RB race_NN ,_, but_CC rather_RB housing_NN ,_, crime_NN prevention_NN or_CC education_NN ._.
Birmingham_NNP ,_, Ala._NNP :_:
The_DT unusual_JJ situation_NN in_IN Birmingham_NNP vividly_RB illustrates_VBZ the_DT divisive_JJ consequences_NNS of_IN carving_VBG out_RP safe_JJ districts_NNS for_IN racial_JJ minorities_NNS ._.
In_IN Birmingham_NNP ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ 57_CD %_NN black_JJ ,_, whites_NNS are_VBP the_DT minority_NN ._.
Insisting_VBG that_IN they_PRP are_VBP protected_VBN by_IN the_DT Voting_NNP Rights_NNP Act_NNP ,_, a_DT group_NN of_IN whites_NNS brought_VBD a_DT federal_JJ suit_NN in_IN 1987_CD to_TO demand_VB that_IN the_DT city_NN abandon_VB at-large_JJ voting_NN for_IN the_DT nine_CD member_NN City_NNP Council_NNP and_CC create_VB nine_CD electoral_JJ districts_NNS ,_, including_VBG four_CD safe_JJ white_JJ districts_NNS ._.
The_DT white_JJ group_NN argued_VBD that_IN whites_NNS were_VBD not_RB fully_RB and_CC fairly_RB represented_VBN ,_, because_IN in_IN city-wide_JJ elections_NNS only_RB black_JJ candidates_NNS or_CC white_JJ candidates_NNS who_WP catered_VBD to_TO ``_`` black_JJ interests_NNS ''_'' could_MD win_VB ._.
No_DT federal_JJ court_NN has_VBZ ruled_VBN that_IN the_DT Voting_NNP Rights_NNP Act_NNP protects_VBZ a_DT white_JJ minority_NN ,_, but_CC in_IN June_NNP the_DT Justice_NNP Department_NNP approved_VBD a_DT districting_NN plan_NN for_IN Birmingham_NNP that_WDT carves_VBZ out_RP three_CD white-majority_JJ districts_NNS and_CC six_CD black-majority_JJ districts_NNS ._.
Richard_NNP Arrington_NNP ,_, Birmingham_NNP 's_POS black_JJ mayor_NN ,_, lamented_VBD the_DT consequences_NNS ._.
``_`` In_IN the_DT past_NN ,_, people_NNS who_WP had_VBD to_TO run_VB for_IN office_NN had_VBD to_TO moderate_VB their_PRP$ views_NNS because_IN they_PRP could_MD n't_RB afford_VB to_TO offend_VB blacks_NNS or_CC whites_NNS ,_, ''_'' he_PRP said_VBD ._.
``_`` Now_RB you_PRP go_VBP to_TO districts_NNS ,_, you_PRP 're_VBP likely_JJ to_TO get_VB candidates_NNS whose_WP$ views_NNS are_VBP more_RBR extreme_JJ ,_, white_JJ and_CC black_JJ ,_, on_IN racial_JJ issues_NNS ._. ''_''
Two_CD hundred_CD years_NNS ago_RB ,_, critics_NNS of_IN the_DT new_JJ United_NNP States_NNP Constitution_NNP warned_VBD that_IN the_DT electoral_JJ districts_NNS for_IN Congress_NNP were_VBD too_RB large_JJ and_CC encompassed_VBD too_RB many_JJ different_JJ economic_JJ interests_NNS ._.
A_DT small_JJ farmer_NN and_CC a_DT seaport_NN merchant_NN could_MD not_RB be_VB represented_VBN by_IN the_DT same_JJ spokesman_NN ,_, they_PRP said_VBD ._.
But_CC James_NNP Madison_NNP refuted_VBD that_DT argument_NN in_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT most_RBS celebrated_JJ political_JJ treatises_NNS ever_RB written_VBN ,_, No._NNP 10_CD of_IN the_DT Federalist_NNP Papers_NNP ._.
Madison_NNP explained_VBD that_IN a_DT representative_NN 's_POS duty_NN was_VBD to_TO speak_VB not_RB for_IN the_DT narrow_JJ interests_NNS of_IN one_CD group_NN but_CC instead_RB for_IN the_DT common_JJ good_NN ._.
Large_JJ ,_, heterogeneous_JJ election_NN districts_NNS would_MD encourage_VB good_JJ government_NN ,_, said_VBD Madison_NNP ,_, because_IN a_DT representative_NN would_MD be_VB compelled_VBN to_TO serve_VB the_DT interests_NNS of_IN all_PDT his_PRP$ constituents_NNS and_CC be_VB servile_JJ to_TO none_NN ._.
Madison_NNP 's_POS noble_JJ and_CC unifying_JJ vision_NN of_IN the_DT representative_NN still_RB can_MD guide_VB us_PRP ._.
As_RB long_RB as_IN we_PRP believe_VBP that_IN all_DT Americans_NNPS ,_, of_IN every_DT race_NN and_CC ethnic_JJ background_NN ,_, have_VBP common_JJ interests_NNS and_CC can_MD live_VB together_RB cooperatively_RB ,_, our_PRP$ political_JJ map_NN should_MD reflect_VB our_PRP$ belief_NN ._.
Racial_JJ gerrymandering_NN --_: creating_VBG separate_JJ black_JJ and_CC white_JJ districts_NNS --_: says_VBZ that_IN we_PRP have_VBP discarded_VBN that_DT belief_NN in_IN our_PRP$ ability_NN to_TO live_VB together_RB and_CC govern_VB ourselves_PRP as_IN one_CD people_NNS ._.
Ms._NNP McCaughey_NNP is_VBZ a_DT constitutional_JJ scholar_NN at_IN the_DT Center_NNP for_IN the_DT Study_NNP of_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP in_IN New_NNP York_NNP ._.
The_DT Justice_NNP Department_NNP has_VBZ distributed_VBN these_DT new_JJ guidelines_NNS for_IN U.S._NNP Attorneys_NNP prosecuting_VBG RICO_NNP cases_NNS ._.
A_DT related_JJ editorial_NN appears_VBZ today_NN ._.
Under_IN -LCB-_-LRB- RICO_NNP -RCB-_-RRB- ,_, the_DT government_NN may_MD seek_VB a_DT temporary_JJ restraining_NN order_NN -LRB-_-LRB- TRO_NN -RRB-_-RRB- upon_IN the_DT filing_NN of_IN a_DT RICO_NNP indictment_NN ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO preserve_VB all_DT forfeitable_JJ assets_NNS until_IN the_DT trial_NN is_VBZ completed_VBN and_CC judgment_NN entered_VBN ._.
Such_JJ orders_NNS can_MD have_VB a_DT wide-ranging_JJ impact_NN on_IN third_JJ parties_NNS who_WP do_VBP business_NN with_IN the_DT defendants_NNS ,_, including_VBG clients_NNS ,_, vendors_NNS ,_, banks_NNS ,_, investors_NNS ,_, creditors_NNS ,_, dependents_NNS ,_, and_CC others_NNS ._.
Some_DT highly_RB publicized_VBN cases_NNS involving_VBG RICO_NNP TROs_NNS have_VBP been_VBN the_DT subject_NN of_IN considerable_JJ criticism_NN in_IN the_DT press_NN ,_, because_IN of_IN a_DT perception_NN that_IN pre-trial_JJ freezing_NN of_IN assets_NNS is_VBZ tantamount_JJ to_TO a_DT seizure_NN of_IN property_NN without_IN due_JJ process_NN ._.
In_IN order_NN to_TO ensure_VB that_IN the_DT rights_NNS of_IN all_DT interested_JJ parties_NNS are_VBP protected_VBN ,_, the_DT Criminal_NNP Division_NNP has_VBZ instituted_VBN the_DT following_JJ requirements_NNS to_TO control_VB the_DT use_NN of_IN TROs_NNS in_IN RICO_NNP prosecutions_NNS ._.
-LRB-_-LRB- It_PRP should_MD be_VB noted_VBN that_IN these_DT requirements_NNS are_VBP in_IN addition_NN to_TO any_DT other_JJ existing_JJ requirements_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN review_NN by_IN the_DT Asset_NNP Forfeiture_NNP Office_NNP ._. -RRB-_-RRB- :_:
1_LS ._. As_IN part_NN of_IN the_DT approval_NN process_NN for_IN RICO_NNP prosecutions_NNS ,_, the_DT prosecutor_NN must_MD submit_VB any_DT proposed_JJ forfeiture_NN TRO_NN for_IN review_NN by_IN the_DT Organized_NNP Crime_NNP and_CC Racketeering_NNP Section_NNP ._.
The_DT prosecutor_NN must_MD show_VB that_IN less-intrusive_JJ remedies_NNS -LRB-_-LRB- such_JJ as_IN bonds_NNS -RRB-_-RRB- are_VBP not_RB likely_JJ to_TO preserve_VB the_DT assets_NNS for_IN forfeiture_NN in_IN the_DT event_NN of_IN a_DT conviction_NN ._.
2_LS ._. In_IN seeking_VBG approval_NN of_IN a_DT TRO_NN ,_, the_DT prosecutor_NN must_MD articulate_VB any_DT anticipated_JJ impact_NN that_DT forfeiture_NN and_CC the_DT TRO_NN would_MD have_VB on_IN innocent_JJ third_JJ parties_NNS ,_, balanced_VBN against_IN the_DT government_NN 's_POS need_NN to_TO preserve_VB the_DT assets_NNS ._.
3_LS ._. In_IN deciding_VBG whether_IN forfeiture_NN -LRB-_-LRB- and_CC ,_, hence_RB ,_, a_DT TRO_NN -RRB-_-RRB- is_VBZ appropriate_JJ ,_, the_DT Section_NN will_MD consider_VB the_DT nature_NN and_CC severity_NN of_IN the_DT offense_NN ;_: the_DT government_NN 's_POS policy_NN is_VBZ not_RB to_TO seek_VB the_DT fullest_JJS forfeiture_NN permissible_NN under_IN the_DT law_NN where_WRB that_DT forfeiture_NN would_MD be_VB disproportionate_JJ to_TO the_DT defendant_NN 's_POS crime_NN ._.
4_LS ._. ``_`` The_DT market_NN started_VBD with_IN several_JJ strikes_NNS against_IN it_PRP ,_, ''_'' said_VBD Peter_NNP DaPuzzo_NNP ,_, head_NN of_IN retail_JJ equity_NN trading_NN at_IN Shearson_NNP Lehman_NNP Hutton_NNP ,_, referring_VBG to_TO news_NN that_IN the_DT labor-management_NN buy-out_NN of_IN UAL_NNP Corp._NNP continued_VBD to_TO unravel_VB ,_, and_CC reports_NNS that_IN the_DT junk-bond_NN market_NN is_VBZ disintegrating_VBG ._.

''_''
Mr._NNP DaPuzzo_NNP also_RB complained_VBD that_IN the_DT sharp_JJ swings_NNS in_IN stock_NN prices_NNS lately_RB is_VBZ scaring_VBG away_RB retail_JJ and_CC foreign_JJ investors_NNS ._.
While_IN Shearson_NNP does_VBZ n't_RB do_VB computer-guided_JJ program_NN trading_NN for_IN its_PRP$ own_JJ account_NN ,_, the_DT firm_NN does_VBZ execute_VB orders_NNS for_IN clients_NNS involved_VBN in_IN the_DT buying_NN and_CC selling_NN of_IN shares_NNS tied_VBN to_TO movements_NNS in_IN certain_JJ stock_NN indexes_NNS ,_, Mr._NNP DaPuzzo_NNP acknowledged_VBD ._.
The_DT volatility_NN inherent_JJ in_IN program_NN trading_NN troubled_VBD other_JJ traders_NNS ,_, too_RB ._.
They_PRP do_VBP n't_RB like_VB the_DT risks_NNS they_PRP are_VBP forced_VBN to_TO assume_VB when_WRB prices_NNS swing_VBP so_RB drastically_RB ._.
Market_NN makers_NNS are_VBP supposed_VBN to_TO keep_VB supplies_NNS of_IN stocks_NNS on_IN hand_NN to_TO maintain_VB orderly_JJ trading_NN when_WRB imbalances_NNS occur_VBP ._.

Mr._NNP Holt_NNP is_VBZ a_DT columnist_NN for_IN the_DT Literary_NNP Review_NNP in_IN London_NNP ._.

''_''
The_DT guidelines_NNS also_RB state_VBP ,_, ``_`` The_DT government_NN 's_POS policy_NN is_VBZ not_RB to_TO seek_VB the_DT fullest_JJS forfeiture_NN permissible_JJ under_IN the_DT law_NN where_WRB that_DT forfeiture_NN would_MD be_VB disproportionate_JJ to_TO the_DT defendant_NN 's_POS crime_NN ._. ''_''
Another_DT provision_NN clarifies_VBZ certain_JJ limits_NNS on_IN when_WRB prosecutors_NNS may_MD use_VB tax-fraud_NN charges_NNS as_IN a_DT basis_NN for_IN bringing_VBG a_DT racketeering_NN case_NN ._.

``_`` The_DT impact_NN ,_, if_IN there_EX is_VBZ any_DT ,_, will_MD be_VB impossible_JJ to_TO judge_VB ahead_RB of_IN time_NN because_IN the_DT decision_NN whether_IN to_TO use_VB -LCB-_-LRB- racketeering_NN charges_NNS -RCB-_-RRB- is_VBZ made_VBN in_IN individual_JJ cases_NNS ''_'' by_IN Justice_NNP Department_NNP officials_NNS in_IN Washington_NNP ,_, he_PRP said_VBD ._.

The_DT talk_NN of_IN a_DT sales_NNS tax_NN rise_NN follows_VBZ a_DT rebuff_NN from_IN Congress_NNP on_IN the_DT question_NN of_IN how_WRB much_JJ the_DT federal_JJ government_NN is_VBZ willing_JJ to_TO spend_VB to_TO aid_NN in_IN California_NNP 's_POS earthquake_NN relief_NN efforts_NNS ._.

To_TO make_VB them_PRP directly_RB comparable_JJ ,_, each_DT index_NN is_VBZ based_VBN on_IN the_DT close_NN of_IN 1969_CD equaling_VBG 100_CD ._.

Directors_NNS of_IN Bergen_NNP Bank_NNP and_CC Den_NNP Norske_NNP Creditbank_NNP ,_, two_CD of_IN Norway_NNP 's_POS leading_JJ banks_NNS ,_, announced_VBD they_PRP had_VBD agreed_VBN to_TO the_DT formal_JJ merger_NN of_IN the_DT banks_NNS ._.
The_DT merger_NN would_MD create_VB Scandinavia_NNP 's_POS seventh_JJ largest_JJS bank_NN ,_, with_IN combined_JJ assets_NNS of_IN 210_CD billion_CD Norwegian_JJ kroner_NN -LRB-_-LRB- $_$ 30.3_CD billion_CD -RRB-_-RRB- ._.
The_DT banks_NNS said_VBD an_DT application_NN for_IN a_DT concession_NN to_TO merge_VB into_IN one_CD entity_NN to_TO be_VB called_VBN Den_NNP Norske_NNP Bank_NNP AS_IN was_VBD sent_VBN Monday_NNP to_TO the_DT Finance_NNP Ministry_NNP ._.

The_DT merger_NN requires_VBZ the_DT approval_NN of_IN Norwegian_JJ authorities_NNS ._.
Savings_NNS and_CC loans_NNS reject_VBP blacks_NNS for_IN mortgage_NN loans_NNS twice_RB as_RB often_RB as_IN they_PRP reject_VBP whites_NNS ,_, the_DT Office_NNP of_IN Thrift_NNP Supervision_NNP said_VBD ._.
But_CC that_DT does_VBZ n't_RB necessarily_RB mean_VB thrifts_NNS are_VBP discriminating_VBG against_IN blacks_NNS ,_, the_DT agency_NN said_VBD ._.
The_DT office_NN ,_, an_DT arm_NN of_IN the_DT Treasury_NNP ,_, said_VBD it_PRP does_VBZ n't_RB have_VB data_NNS on_IN the_DT financial_JJ position_NN of_IN applicants_NNS and_CC thus_RB ca_MD n't_RB determine_VB why_WRB blacks_NNS are_VBP rejected_VBN more_RBR often_RB ._.
Nevertheless_RB ,_, on_IN Capitol_NNP Hill_NNP ,_, where_WRB the_DT information_NN was_VBD released_VBN yesterday_NN at_IN a_DT Senate_NNP banking_NN subcommittee_NN hearing_NN ,_, lawmakers_NNS said_VBD they_PRP are_VBP worried_JJ that_IN financial_JJ institutions_NNS are_VBP routinely_RB discriminating_VBG against_IN minorities_NNS ._.

Sen._NNP Alan_NNP Dixon_NNP -LRB-_-LRB- D_NNP ,_, Ill._NNP -RRB-_-RRB- ,_, chairman_NN of_IN the_DT subcommittee_NN on_IN consumer_NN and_CC regulatory_JJ affairs_NNS ,_, said_VBD ,_, ``_`` I_PRP 'm_VBP not_RB a_DT statistician_NN ._.

''_''
James_NNP Grohl_NNP ,_, a_DT spokesman_NN for_IN the_DT U.S._NNP League_NNP of_IN Savings_NNP Institutions_NNP ,_, said_VBD ,_, ``_`` The_DT data_NN is_VBZ a_DT red_JJ flag_NN ,_, but_CC lacking_VBG the_DT financial_JJ data_NN you_PRP ca_MD n't_RB make_VB a_DT case_NN that_DT discrimination_NN is_VBZ widespread_JJ ._. ``_`` It_PRP 's_VBZ hard_JJ to_TO see_VB how_WRB an_DT investment_NN by_IN the_DT largest_JJS -LCB-_-LRB- cable_NN operator_NN -RCB-_-RRB- in_IN the_DT weaker_JJR of_IN the_DT two_CD networks_NNS is_VBZ anti-competitive_JJ ,_, when_WRB the_DT stronger_JJR of_IN the_DT two_CD networks_NNS is_VBZ owned_VBN by_IN the_DT second_RB largest_JJS ''_'' cable_NN operator_NN ,_, Mr._NNP Kern_NNP said_VBD ._.
In_IN addition_NN to_TO owning_VBG HBO_NNP ,_, with_IN 22_CD million_CD subscribers_NNS ,_, Time_NNP Warner_NNP separately_RB operates_VBZ cable-TV_NN system_NN serving_VBG about_RB 5.6_CD million_CD cable-TV_NN subscribers_NNS ._.

In_IN its_PRP$ suit_NN against_IN Time_NNP ,_, Viacom_NNP says_VBZ the_DT ownership_NN of_IN both_CC cable_NN systems_NNS and_CC cable-programming_JJ networks_NNS gives_VBZ the_DT company_NN too_RB much_JJ market_NN power_NN ._.

Together_RB ,_, they_PRP control_VBP nearly_RB 40_CD %_NN of_IN Turner_NNP Broadcasting_NNP Systems_NNP Inc._NNP ;_: Tele-Communications_NNP has_VBZ a_DT 21.8_CD %_NN stake_NN ,_, while_IN Time_NNP Warner_NNP has_VBZ a_DT 17.8_CD %_NN stake_NN ._.
But_CC since_IN Time_NNP 's_POS merger_NN with_IN Warner_NNP Communications_NNP Inc._NNP ,_, relations_NNS between_IN the_DT two_CD have_VBP become_VBN strained_JJ ._.

But_CC Showtime_NNP has_VBZ continued_VBN to_TO sign_VB new_JJ contracts_NNS with_IN Hollywood_NNP studios_NNS ,_, and_CC yesterday_NN announced_VBD it_PRP will_MD buy_VB movies_NNS from_IN Columbia_NNP Pictures_NNP Entertainment_NNP Inc._NNP ,_, which_WDT currently_RB has_VBZ a_DT non-exclusive_JJ arrangement_NN with_IN HBO_NNP ._.
The_DT Federal_NNP Trade_NNP Commission_NNP said_VBD it_PRP authorized_VBD its_PRP$ staff_NN to_TO seek_VB a_DT preliminary_JJ injunction_NN barring_VBG Imo_NNP Industries_NNP Inc._NNP from_IN acquiring_VBG the_DT shares_NNS outstanding_JJ of_IN the_DT U.S._NNP unit_NN of_IN the_DT British_JJ company_NN ,_, United_NNP Scientific_NNP Holdings_NNP PLC_NNP ,_, for_IN $_$ 69_CD million_CD ._.
The_DT FTC_NNP said_VBD it_PRP ``_`` had_VBD reason_NN to_TO believe_VB that_IN the_DT proposed_JJ acquisition_NN could_MD substantially_RB reduce_VB competition_NN ''_'' in_IN the_DT production_NN of_IN certain_JJ image_NN intensifier_NN tubes_NNS ,_, which_WDT are_VBP important_JJ components_NNS of_IN night-vision_JJ devices_NNS sold_VBN primarily_RB to_TO the_DT defense_NN industry_NN ._.

The_DT airline_NN industry_NN 's_POS fortunes_NNS ,_, in_IN dazzling_JJ shape_NN for_IN most_RBS of_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, have_VBP taken_VBN a_DT sudden_JJ turn_NN for_IN the_DT worse_JJR in_IN the_DT past_JJ few_JJ weeks_NNS ._.
Citing_VBG rising_VBG fuel_NN costs_NNS ,_, promotional_JJ fare_NN cuts_NNS and_CC a_DT general_JJ slowdown_NN in_IN travel_NN ,_, several_JJ major_JJ carriers_NNS have_VBP posted_VBN or_CC are_VBP expected_VBN to_TO post_VB relatively_RB poor_JJ third-quarter_JJ results_NNS ._.
Yesterday_NN ,_, USAir_NNP Group_NNP Inc._NNP ,_, recently_RB one_CD of_IN the_DT industry_NN 's_POS stellar_JJ performers_NNS ,_, posted_VBD a_DT worse-than-expected_JJ $_$ 77.7_CD million_CD net_JJ loss_NN for_IN the_DT period_NN ._.
So_RB far_RB ,_, the_DT industry_NN 's_POS fourth_JJ quarter_NN is_VBZ n't_RB looking_VBG too_RB strong_JJ either_RB ,_, prompting_VBG many_JJ analysts_NNS to_TO slash_VB earning_NN projections_NNS for_IN the_DT rest_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN by_IN as_RB much_JJ as_IN one-fourth_NN ._.
And_CC they_PRP say_VBP the_DT outlook_NN for_IN 1990_CD is_VBZ nearly_RB as_RB bad_JJ ._.

This_DT turn_NN of_IN events_NNS has_VBZ put_VBN a_DT big_JJ damper_NN on_IN an_DT industry_NN that_WDT seemed_VBD almost_RB invincible_JJ last_JJ spring_NN ,_, when_WRB fares_NNS were_VBD rising_VBG at_IN double-digit_JJ rates_NNS and_CC many_JJ carriers_NNS seemed_VBD to_TO be_VB growing_VBG fat_JJ on_IN near-monopolies_NNS in_IN certain_JJ markets_NNS ._.
Now_RB ,_, many_JJ airline_NN companies_NNS might_MD become_VB a_DT lot_NN less_RBR attractive_JJ as_IN takeover_NN targets_NNS on_IN Wall_NNP Street_NNP ._.
The_DT downturn_NN also_RB raises_VBZ questions_NNS about_IN the_DT carriers_NNS '_POS ambitious_JJ orders_NNS for_IN new_JJ airplanes_NNS ,_, which_WDT currently_RB total_VBP $_$ 32.5_CD billion_CD over_IN the_DT next_JJ three_CD years_NNS ._.
For_IN travelers_NNS ,_, though_RB ,_, the_DT industry_NN 's_POS problems_NNS have_VBP had_VBD some_DT positive_JJ effects_NNS ._.
In_IN recent_JJ weeks_NNS ,_, airlines_NNS have_VBP cut_VBN numerous_JJ fares_NNS in_IN leisure_NN markets_NNS to_TO try_VB to_TO win_VB back_RP customers_NNS ._.
Others_NNS have_VBP tried_VBN to_TO spruce_VB up_RP frequent-flier_JJ programs_NNS ._.
Previously_RB ,_, airlines_NNS were_VBD limiting_VBG the_DT programs_NNS because_IN they_PRP were_VBD becoming_VBG too_RB expensive_JJ ._.
Just_RB last_JJ week_NN ,_, for_IN example_NN ,_, Trans_NNP World_NNP Airlines_NNP and_CC Pan_NNP Am_NNP Corp._NNP 's_POS Pan_NNP American_NNP World_NNP Airways_NNP went_VBD so_RB far_RB as_IN to_TO offer_VB cash_NN rebates_NNS or_CC gift_NN checks_NNS of_IN $_$ 200_CD to_TO $_$ 1,000_CD to_TO certain_JJ frequent-flier_JJ members_NNS making_VBG trans-Atlantic_JJ flights_NNS in_IN business_NN class_NN or_CC first_JJ class_NN ._.
The_DT industry_NN 's_POS slowdown_NN became_VBD apparent_JJ this_DT month_NN when_WRB AMR_NNP Corp._NNP ,_, parent_NN of_IN American_NNP Airlines_NNP ,_, reported_VBD an_DT 8.8_CD %_NN drop_NN in_IN third-quarter_JJ net_JJ income_NN and_CC said_VBD its_PRP$ fourth_JJ quarter_NN would_MD be_VB ``_`` disappointing_JJ ._. ''_''
Shortly_RB before_IN that_DT ,_, USAir_NNP had_VBD said_VBD its_PRP$ third-quarter_JJ results_NNS would_MD be_VB ``_`` significantly_RB lower_JJR ''_'' than_IN a_DT year_NN earlier_RBR ._.
Yesterday_NN ,_, it_PRP provided_VBD the_DT details_NNS :_:
Its_PRP$ loss_NN of_IN $_$ 77.7_CD million_CD ,_, or_CC $_$ 1.86_CD a_DT share_NN ,_, contrasted_VBN with_IN net_NN of_IN $_$ 68.5_CD million_CD ,_, or_CC $_$ 1.58_CD a_DT share_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT 1988_CD third_JJ quarter_NN ._.
Revenue_NN rose_VBD only_RB 3.3_CD %_NN in_IN the_DT latest_JJS period_NN ,_, to_TO $_$ 1.53_CD billion_CD from_IN $_$ 1.48_CD billion_CD ._.
For_IN the_DT nine_CD months_NNS ,_, the_DT Arlington_NNP ,_, Va._NNP ,_, company_NN 's_POS net_NN plunged_VBD 73_CD %_NN to_TO $_$ 38.5_CD million_CD ,_, or_CC 76_CD cents_NNS a_DT share_NN ,_, from_IN $_$ 142.2_CD million_CD ,_, or_CC $_$ 3.28_CD a_DT share_NN ._.

``_`` I_PRP believe_VBP that_IN as_RB soon_RB as_IN the_DT selling_NN abates_VBZ somewhat_RB we_PRP could_MD see_VB a_DT rally_NN back_RB to_TO the_DT $_$ 1.20_CD region_NN ,_, ''_'' she_PRP added_VBD ._.

In_IN 1987_CD ,_, KKR_NNP for_IN the_DT second_JJ time_NN piled_VBD debt_NN onto_IN Storer_NNP 's_POS TV_NNP stations_NNS ,_, selling_VBG them_PRP for_IN $_$ 1.3_CD billion_CD to_TO a_DT new_JJ entity_NN that_WDT was_VBD 45%-owned_JJ by_IN KKR_NNP and_CC 55%-owned_JJ by_IN Gillett_NNP Corp._NNP ,_, which_WDT now_RB operates_VBZ the_DT SCI_NNP TV_NNP stations_NNS ._.

-LRB-_-LRB- Storer_NNP also_RB took_VBD $_$ 125_CD million_CD of_IN junior_JJ SCI_NNP TV_NNP bonds_NNS as_IN partial_JJ payment_NN for_IN the_DT TV_NN assets_NNS ._. -RRB-_-RRB-

Meanwhile_RB ,_, Mr._NNP Gillett_NNP risks_VBZ losing_VBG his_PRP$ entire_JJ equity_NN investment_NN of_IN about_IN $_$ 100_CD million_CD in_IN SCI_NNP TV_NNP if_IN the_DT company_NN ca_MD n't_RB be_VB restructured_VBN ._.

SCI_NNP TV_NNP 's_POS grace_NN period_NN for_IN paying_VBG its_PRP$ bills_NNS is_VBZ due_JJ to_TO expire_VB Nov._NNP 16_CD ._.

But_CC it_PRP 's_VBZ understood_VBN that_IN Mr._NNP Kravis_NNP is_VBZ disappointed_VBN that_IN Mr._NNP Gillett_NNP did_VBD n't_RB manage_VB to_TO boost_VB SCI_NNP TV_NNP 's_POS operating_NN profit_NN after_IN the_DT buy-out_NN ._.
Mr._NNP Kravis_NNP apparently_RB thinks_VBZ SCI_NNP TV_NNP can_MD survive_VB if_IN lenders_NNS extend_VBP its_PRP$ debt_NN payments_NNS until_IN TV_NN stations_NNS rise_VBP in_IN value_NN again_RB ,_, allowing_VBG SCI_NNP TV_NNP to_TO sell_VB assets_NNS to_TO pay_VB debt_NN ._.
